<FONT SIZE=3 ><A HREF="#02STP1201_2">QuickLinks</A></FONT>
<font size=3> -- Click here to rapidly navigate through this document</font>
<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit 10-d  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ADC </B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>The </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Broadband </B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>Company&#153;<BR></FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>Management Incentive Plan Document<BR>
Fiscal Year 2002  </B></FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="2",CHK=1044556,FOLIO='1',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KA1201A.;12',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_ka1201_1_2"> </A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ka1201_management_incentive_plan_document_fiscal_year_2002"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ka1201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>MANAGEMENT INCENTIVE PLAN DOCUMENT<BR>  Fiscal Year 2002    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Plan Name and Effective Date  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The name of this Plan is the ADC Telecommunications,&nbsp;Inc. Management Incentive Plan. The plan is effective from November&nbsp;1, 2001 through
October&nbsp;31, 2002. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Purpose  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The purpose of the Plan is to provide, with full regard to the protection of shareholder's investments, a direct financial incentive for eligible managers and
individual contributors to make a significant contribution to ADC's established goals. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Eligibility  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Eligibility for Fiscal Year 2002 is limited to full or part-time regular executives, certain management and higher-level individual contributor
positions. Temporary employees and independent contractors are not eligible for participation in this plan. In order to be eligible, an employee cannot participate in any other ADC incentive plan
other than the stock option program and must be employed in an eligible position on or before October&nbsp;1, 2002. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Timing of Payment  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Payments that become due under this Plan are made as soon as administratively feasible following the close of ADC's fiscal year. In the past, this payment date
has generally occurred in late December. All payments are subject to appropriate withholdings. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Plan Goals  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Plan reinforces the key goals that support ADC's long-term strategic plans. These goals differ across business groups. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Although
EVA Improvement has been and continues to be a key measure of ADC success, it will not be directly measured in this year's Plan. Rather, the Plan will focus on the key EVA
Improvement drivers of revenue, expense as a percent of revenue and balance sheet measures. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
balance sheet goal is a measurement of how well ADC manages cash flow and may be in the form of free cash flow, inventory turns or days sales outstanding depending upon business
unit. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>2</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=2,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="2",CHK=8858,FOLIO='2',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KA1201A.;12',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_ka1201_1_3"> </A>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Following
is a description of each plan component: </FONT></P>

<!-- User-specified TAGGED TABLE -->
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<TH WIDTH="34%" ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT SIZE=1><B>Plan Goal<BR> </B></FONT><HR NOSHADE></TH>
<TH WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=1>&nbsp;</FONT></TH>
<TH WIDTH="63%" ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=1><B>Definition</B></FONT><HR NOSHADE></TH>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#CCEEFF" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="34%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Revenue</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="63%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
The value ADC can recognize for goods shipped or services provided to our customers, net of returns received and in accordance with U.S. accounting principles (GAAP).</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="White" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="34%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Expense as a Percent of Revenue</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="63%" ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Operating and fixed cost of sales expenses expressed as a percent of revenue:<BR>
<U>Pro-Forma Operating Expense + Fixed Cost of Sales Expenses<BR>
Revenue</U></FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#CCEEFF" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="34%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Free Cash Flow</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="63%" ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Total cash provided by our operating activities less property and equipment purchases:<BR>
(Total Cash Provided by Operating Activities) &#151; (Property and Equipment Purchases)</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="White" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="34%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Inventory Turns</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="63%" ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Measures how fast we move inventory through our factories and distribution centers. Payment will be based on a rolling three-month average as of October 2002. The following calculation will be used:<BR>
<U>[Three-month sum of Direct Cost of Sales/# of working days in those months] * # of working days in fiscal year</U><BR>
(Mo. 1 Ending Direct Inventory + Mo. 2 + Mo. 3)/3</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#CCEEFF" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="34%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Days Sales Outstanding (DSO)</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="63%" ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Measures how quickly we collect money owed to ADC for the products and services we sell. Payment will be based on the internal DSO calculation as of October 31, 2002:<BR>
<U>Average Gross Accounts Receivable</U><BR>
Average Daily Net Sales over the previous 13-week period</FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<!-- end of user-specified TAGGED TABLE -->


<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Individual Performance  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In addition to the business performance goals, an individual performance factor will be applied to the calculation of incentive payments for 2002. The individual
multiplier will be based on the performance ratings as defined in the new ADCperform performance management system and will be applied at the time of payment as follows: </FONT></P>

<!-- User-specified TAGGED TABLE -->
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><TABLE WIDTH="66%" BORDER=0 CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<TH WIDTH="26%" ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT SIZE=1><B>Rating<BR> </B></FONT><HR NOSHADE></TH>
<TH WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=1>&nbsp;</FONT></TH>
<TH WIDTH="71%" ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=1><B>Individual Performance Adjustment</B></FONT><HR NOSHADE></TH>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#CCEEFF" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="26%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
1 (Top 5-10%)</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="71%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Business Performance &times; 1.5</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="White" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="26%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
2 (Middle 80-90%)</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="71%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Business Performance &times; 1.0</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#CCEEFF" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="26%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
3 (Bottom 5-10%)</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="71%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Business Performance &times; 0.5</FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE></DIV>
<!-- end of user-specified TAGGED TABLE -->


<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Minimum Performance Payment Requirement  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;To ensure protection of shareholder interest, a minimum level of operating income must be achieved before an incentive payment can be generated. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>3</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=3,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="2",CHK=652492,FOLIO='3',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KA1201A.;12',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_ka1201_1_4"> </A>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>Calculation of Payment  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior to making any payment under this Plan, the Board of Directors must agree that the claimed performance levels have been achieved. The size of an incentive
award will be based on four factors: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>1.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><B>Target Incentive Opportunity  </B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;expressed as a percentage of an individual's FY 2002 eligible base salary earnings.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>2.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><B>FY2002 Eligible Base Salary Earnings  </B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. This is the amount actually paid to the participant during the fiscal year in Base Salary. Base Salary for purposes
of this Plan includes paid time off (such as vacation,
sick pay or PTO), and excludes any salary continuation pay paid through ADC payroll and any disability insurance paid by an insurer.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>3.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><B>Business Performance  </B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;against the established goals.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>4.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><B>Individual Performance Multiplier  </B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
range of potential awards can be from zero to three times the target award. At target business and Level 2 individual performance, the award would be 100% of the stated target
percent of Base Salary Earnings. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;For
the business performance factors, this can be expressed as follows: </FONT></P>

<!-- User-specified TAGGED TABLE -->
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<TH WIDTH="23%" ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT SIZE=1><B>Threshold<BR> </B></FONT><HR NOSHADE></TH>
<TH WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=1>&nbsp;</FONT></TH>
<TH WIDTH="23%" ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=1><B>Annual Operating Plan (AOP)</B></FONT><HR NOSHADE></TH>
<TH WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=1>&nbsp;</FONT></TH>
<TH WIDTH="23%" ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=1><B>Target</B></FONT><HR NOSHADE></TH>
<TH WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=1>&nbsp;</FONT></TH>
<TH WIDTH="23%" ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=1><B>Maximum</B></FONT><HR NOSHADE></TH>
</TR>
<TR VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="23%"><FONT SIZE=2>0% of Target Incentive Opportunity</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="23%"><FONT SIZE=2>50% of Target Incentive Opportunity</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="23%"><FONT SIZE=2>100% of Target Incentive Opportunity</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="23%"><FONT SIZE=2>300% of Target Incentive Opportunity</FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<!-- end of user-specified TAGGED TABLE -->


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Results
between threshold-target, AOP-target, and target-maximum are interpolated for each goal. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Here
is an example of a hypothetical award calculation. Refer to the Goal Sheet for the performance factors and weightings that apply. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Assume
a Business Unit Plan participant with the following facts: </FONT></P>

<!-- User-specified TAGGED TABLE -->
<DIV ALIGN="CENTER"><TABLE WIDTH="63%" BORDER=0 CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR BGCOLOR="#CCEEFF" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="48%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Target Opportunity:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
15% of base salary earnings</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="White" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="48%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Base Salary Earnings:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
60,000</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#CCEEFF" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="48%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Performance Rating:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Level 2</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="White" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="48%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
ADC Operating Income:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="48%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Performance above threshold</FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE></DIV>
<!-- end of user-specified TAGGED TABLE -->

</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#CCEEFF" VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<TD COLSPAN=4><BR><FONT SIZE=2><I>Payment Calculation: </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
60,000 (base salary) * 15% (incentive target) * 101.5% (business performance) * 1.0 (individual performance factor)= 9,135</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="12%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="7%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<!-- end of user-specified TAGGED TABLE -->


<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Effect of Change in Employment Status  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Termination of Employment  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. If employment with ADC is terminated for any reason other than death and if the Employment Termination Date
occurs prior to the end of the Fiscal Year, a participant will not
receive an award under the Plan. For purposes of this Plan, the "Employment Termination Date" is the date that the participant ceases to be an employee of ADC (as determined by the company). In the
case of termination of employment by ADC, the Employment Termination Date shall be determined without regard to whether such termination is with or without cause or with or without reasonable notice. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Transfer, Promotion or Demotion to another position with a different ADC incentive plan, target incentive opportunity or business goals  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. A participant, who transfers, is promoted or demoted to another
position with a different plan, target incentive opportunity or business goals will receive a prorated
calculation of payment based upon the number of full months served in each position. The participant must be in the new position by the first of the month and remain in the position for a full month
in order to receive credit for that month under the new plan, target or goals. Full year earnings will be prorated based on the number of full months eligible under each plan. For example, a
participant transferring from Software Systems to Connectivity on June&nbsp;10 would receive eight months payment under the Software Systems plan (November-June) and four months under
Connectivity (July-October). In order to receive payment under the plan during the plan year, a participant must have completed one full month of service under the plan. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Death  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. If a participant dies during the fiscal year, a pro-rated payment will be made to the participant's estate. The payment will be based upon the time the
participant served in the eligible position during the fiscal year. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Administration  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A Management Incentive Plan Committee ("Committee"), appointed and authorized by the Company's Board of Directors, will administer this Plan. Subject to the
complete and full discretion of the Board of Directors, the Committee is authorized to make all decisions as required in administration </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>5</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=5,SEQ=5,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="2",CHK=201344,FOLIO='5',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KA1201A.;12',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_ka1201_1_6"> </A>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
of the Plan and to exercise its discretion to define, interpret, construe, apply, approve, administer, withdraw and make any exceptions to the terms of the Plan. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Right to Modify  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ADC reserves the right to modify or adjust the Plan at any time in its sole discretion. The Participant explicitly agrees with this modification right of ADC. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Governing Law  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Plan is made and shall be continued in accordance with the laws of the State of Minnesota, U.S.A. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Severability  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If any provision of this Plan shall be held invalid, illegal or unenforceable by a court or tribunal of competent jurisdiction, this Plan shall be deemed
severable and such invalidity, illegality or unenforceability shall not affect any other provision of this Plan which shall be enforced in accordance with the intent of this Plan. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Assignment  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Company shall have the right to assign this Plan to its successors and assigns and this Plan shall inure to the benefit of and be enforceable by said
successors and assigns. Participant may not assign this Plan or any rights hereunder. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Entire Understanding  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Plan constitutes the entire understanding between the parties regarding the payment of incentive compensation under this Plan, and it supercedes any and all
prior agreements or understandings, whether oral or written, express or implied, on such subject matter. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>Amendment or Termination of Plan  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Plan shall not entitle Participants to any future compensation. The Plan is not an element of the employees' salary or base compensation and shall not be
considered as part of such in the event of severance, redundancy, or resignation. ADC has no obligation to offer incentive plans to Participants in the future. The Participant understands and accepts
that the incentive payments made under the Plan are entirely at the sole discretion of ADC. Specifically, ADC assumes no obligation to the Participant under this Plan with respect to any doctrine or
principle of acquired rights or similar concept. Subject to the provisions of the Plan, ADC may amend or terminate the Plan or discontinue the payment of incentives under the Plan at any time, at its
sole discretion and without advance notice. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>6</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=6,SEQ=6,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="2",CHK=898902,FOLIO='6',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KA1201A.;12',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<BR>

<DOCUMENT>
<TYPE>EX-10.G
<SEQUENCE>4
<FILENAME>a2067550zex-10_g.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 10-G
<TEXT>
<HTML>
<HEAD>
<TITLE> Prepared by MERRILL CORPORATION
</TITLE>
</HEAD>
<BODY BGCOLOR="#FFFFFF" LINK=BLUE  VLINK=PURPLE>
<BR>
<FONT SIZE=3 ><A HREF="#02STP1201_3">QuickLinks</A></FONT>
<font size=3> -- Click here to rapidly navigate through this document</font>
<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit 10.g  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS,&nbsp;INC.<BR>
EXECUTIVE INCENTIVE EXCHANGE PLAN<BR>
AS AMENDED AND RESTATED<BR>
EFFECTIVE AS OF NOVEMBER 1, 2001  </B></FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="3",CHK=352074,FOLIO='1',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KC1201A.;14',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_kc1201_1_2"> </A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kc1201_adc_telecommunications,_inc._e__adc04246"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kc1201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS,&nbsp;INC.<BR>  EXECUTIVE INCENTIVE EXCHANGE PLAN<BR>  AS AMENDED AND RESTATED EFFECTIVE<BR>  AS OF NOVEMBER 1, 2001    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>I. PLAN NAME AND EFFECTIVE DATE  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The name of this Plan is the ADC Telecommunications,&nbsp;Inc. ("Company") Executive Incentive Exchange Plan. This statement of the Plan incorporates changes
approved on October&nbsp;1, 2001 to be first effective for exchange elections made for potential incentive compensation earned in fiscal year 2002. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>II. PURPOSE  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The purpose of the Plan is to provide rewards for exceptional performance of eligible executives, align executive rewards with shareholder interests, and provide
an incentive for retention. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>III. ADMINISTRATION  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Plan will be administered by the same Committee ("Committee") appointed and authorized by the Company's Board of Directors to administer the Company's Global
Stock Incentive Plan. The Committee is authorized to make all decisions as required in administration of the Plan and to exercise its discretion to define, interpret, construe, apply, and make any
exceptions to the terms of the Plan. The Plan operates on an annual basis, coterminous with the Company's fiscal year. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>IV. STOCK OPTION ISSUANCE  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All stock options issued under this Plan will be granted under the Company's Global Stock Incentive Plan and/or its successor plans. The terms of each option
grant will be detailed in the Global Stock Incentive Plan and stock option agreement provided at the time of the grant. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>V. ELIGIBILITY  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee will from time to time establish rules of eligibility for participation in the Plan. Eligibility is limited to ADC executives who receive approval
from the Chief Executive Officer for participation during a Plan year, provided that eligibility is confined to selected executives at U.S. salary grade 21 or higher, plus those at salary grade 20 who
were selected for the previous Plan year. All Plan participants must also be participants under the Company's Management Incentive Plan ("MIP"). No employee may become a participant for any Plan year
after November&nbsp;1<SUP>st</SUP> of that Plan year. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>VI. EXCHANGE ELECTION  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Prior to the beginning of each Plan year, participants may elect to exchange up to 50% of their MIP award for that Plan year for options to purchase common stock
of the Company. Such elections may be made in 10% increments up to a maximum of 50% of the cash MIP award. No exchange will be made
if the portion elected for exchange is less than one hundred dollars ($100.00). An election made under this Plan is irrevocable, and may not be withdrawn or terminated under any circumstances once
made. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>VII. EXCHANGE DATE  </B></FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Exchanges made under this Plan will be made as soon as administratively feasible following the close of the Plan year and the finalization of MIP awards for such
Plan year. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>2</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=2,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="3",CHK=305821,FOLIO='2',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KC1201A.;14',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_kc1201_1_3"> </A>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>VIII. EFFECTIVE DATE OF STOCK OPTION GRANT  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The effective date of the stock options granted under the Plan will be the last business day of the Plan year. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>IX. EXCHANGE CALCULATION  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The MIP award that will be used to calculate the exchange to options will be the incentive amount eligible to be paid for the fiscal year, as determined in
accordance with the MIP. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
number of option shares granted as a result of the exchange will equal the dollar amount of the MIP award elected to be exchanged multiplied by 4.5, with this product being divided
by the closing market value of ADC common stock on the effective date of the grant. The final number of shares will be rounded to the nearest whole number of shares. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Participation
in this Plan causes that portion of the MIP cash incentive amount that is elected to be exchanged to be forfeited, except as described under Section&nbsp;XIII. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>X. NATURE OF OPTIONS TO BE GRANTED  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All options granted under this Plan will be nonqualified stock options, and not "incentive stock options" within the meaning of Section&nbsp;422 of the Internal
Revenue Code of 1986, as amended. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>XI. TERM AND VESTING OF OPTIONS  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;All options granted under this Plan shall be 100% vested as of the effective date of the grant and be exercisable as soon as administratively feasible. The
Company shall not be responsible for any delay in the exercisability of the options from the effective date of the grant. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>XII. EXERCISE PRICE OF OPTIONS  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The exercise price of the stock options granted under this plan will be the fair market value of the Company's common stock on the effective date of the grant, as
determined in accordance with the terms of the Global Stock Incentive Plan. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>XIII. EFFECT OF CHANGE IN EMPLOYMENT STATUS ON CURRENT YEAR ELECTIONS (CHANGES DURING THE PLAN YEAR)  </B></FONT></P>

<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>A.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><I>Termination of Employment  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. A participant whose employment is terminated prior to the end of a Plan year, whether voluntarily or involuntarily (with or without cause), will
relinquish all rights to the
grant of any stock option under this Plan and will forfeit the MIP cash equivalent amount as defined in his/her irrevocable exchange election.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>B.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><I>Change in Job Status Based Upon a Demotion  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. If a participant is demoted from an eligible position under this Plan to an ineligible position, a pro-rated
portion of the participant's cash MIP award will be
exchanged under this Plan. The pro-rated portion shall be calculated according to the time served in the eligible position during the Plan year, provided at least three months were served
in the eligible position.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>C.</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><I>Death  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. If a participant dies during a Plan year, the participant's heirs as determined by will or applicable laws of descent and distribution will have
no right to receive any stock
options under this Plan. Heirs will receive instead the cash equivalent of the participant's MIP award that is calculated according to the MIP Plan. </FONT></DD></DL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>3</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=3,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="3",CHK=633745,FOLIO='3',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KC1201A.;14',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_kc1201_1_4"> </A>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>XIV. AMENDMENT OR TERMINATION OF PLAN  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Board of Directors reserves and retains the right to modify, rescind or terminate this Plan in whole or in part, at its sole discretion, and nothing in this
Plan limits this right in any way or creates any rights in any employee in future participation in this Plan or any other, or constitutes any guarantee of compensation or employment with ADC. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><B>XV. CAUTIONARY STATEMENT  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Participants should be aware that their participation in the Plan involves risk, in that the value of the stock options granted pursuant to the Plan will depend
on the value of ADC common stock. An investment in ADC common stock involves risk. Participants are encouraged to review ADC's filings with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission for a
description of some of the risk factors associated with an investment in ADC's common stock. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>4</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=4,SEQ=4,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="3",CHK=139245,FOLIO='4',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KC1201A.;14',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_kc1201_1_5"> </A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kc1201_attachment_i_exchange_example"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kc1201_2"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>ATTACHMENT I<BR>  EXCHANGE EXAMPLE    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<!-- User-specified TAGGED TABLE -->
<TABLE WIDTH="76%" BORDER=0 CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<TH WIDTH="49%" ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT SIZE=1><B>Assumptions:<BR> </B></FONT><HR NOSHADE></TH>
<TH WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=1>&nbsp;</FONT></TH>
<TH WIDTH="49%" ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT SIZE=1>&nbsp;</FONT><BR></TH>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#CCEEFF" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="49%"><FONT SIZE=2>Annual earnings for Plan Year:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="49%"><FONT SIZE=2>$100,000</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="White" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="49%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
Exchange election:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="49%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
50% of MIP award</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#CCEEFF" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="49%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
MIP award:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="49%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
$30,000</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="White" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="49%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
FMV of stock on last day of Plan Year:</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="3%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="49%"><FONT SIZE=2><BR>
$5.00</FONT></TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
<!-- end of user-specified TAGGED TABLE -->


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Exchange Calculation  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> (Number of option shares awarded) </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<U>MIP
Award&nbsp;&times;&nbsp;Exchange Election %&nbsp;&times;&nbsp;4.5</U>&nbsp;=<BR>
FMV per share on last day of Plan year </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><U>$30,000&nbsp;&times;&nbsp;50%&nbsp;&times;&nbsp;4.5</U>&nbsp;=<BR>
$5.00 </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><U>$67,500</U>&nbsp;=
13,500 option shares<BR>
$5.00&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;
 </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>Exercise
Price: $5.00 (FMV on grant date)<BR>
Grant Date: Last day of Plan year </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>5</FONT></P>

<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit 10-i    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B>ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS,&nbsp;INC.  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><B> EXECUTIVE CHANGE IN CONTROL<BR>
SEVERANCE PAY PLAN<BR>
(2002 Restatement)  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>Effective January&nbsp;1, 2002 </FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="4",CHK=601713,FOLIO='0',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KE1201A.;5',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_kf1201_1_1"> </A> </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kf1201_adc_telecommunications,_inc._e__adc03336"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kf1201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS,&nbsp;INC.    <BR>    <BR>    EXECUTIVE CHANGE IN CONTROL<BR>  SEVERANCE PAY PLAN<BR>  (2002 Restatement)    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kf1201_table_of_contents"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kf1201_2"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>TABLE OF CONTENTS    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<!-- User-specified TAGGED TABLE -->
<TABLE WIDTH="100%" BORDER=0 CELLSPACING=0 CELLPADDING=0>
<TR VALIGN="BOTTOM">
<TH WIDTH="12%" ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT><BR></TH>
<TH WIDTH="2%"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TH>
<TH WIDTH="6%" ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT><BR></TH>
<TH WIDTH="2%"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TH>
<TH WIDTH="9%" ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT><BR></TH>
<TH WIDTH="2%"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TH>
<TH WIDTH="59%" ALIGN="LEFT"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT><BR></TH>
<TH WIDTH="2%"><FONT SIZE=1>&nbsp;</FONT></TH>
<TH WIDTH="5%" ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=1><B>Page</B></FONT><HR NOSHADE></TH>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="#CCEEFF" VALIGN="TOP">
<TD WIDTH="12%"><FONT SIZE=2>SECTION 1.</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD COLSPAN=5><FONT SIZE=2>INTRODUCTION</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="2%"><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;</FONT></TD>
<TD WIDTH="5%" ALIGN="RIGHT"><FONT SIZE=2>1</FONT></TD>
</TR>
<TR BGCOLOR="White" VALIGN="TOP">

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>ii</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=3,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="4",CHK=818975,FOLIO='2',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KF1201A.;7',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
