<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="oe1201_adc_telecommunications,_inc._4__adc01902"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_oe1201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS,&nbsp;INC. 401(k) EXCESS PLAN<BR>  (2002 Restatement)    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WITNESSETH: That </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS,&nbsp;INC., a Minnesota corporation (the "Principal Sponsor"), by resolution of its Board of Directors, has heretofore established and maintained a
nonqualified, unfunded, deferred compensation and supplemental retirement plan for the benefit of a select group of management or highly compensated eligible employees, which in its most restated
form, is embodied in a document effective January&nbsp;1, 2001 and entitled "ADC Telecommunications,&nbsp;Inc. 401(k) Excess Plan (2001 Restatement);" and </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
The Principal Sponsor has reserved to itself the power to make further amendments of the Plan documents; and </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
It is desired to amend and restate the Plan documents to be a single document in the manner hereinafter set forth; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW,
THEREFORE, The Plan documents are hereby amended and restated, effective as of January&nbsp;1, 2002, to read in full as follows: </FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=5,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=911802,FOLIO='1',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OE1201A.;10',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:46' -->
<A NAME="page_oe1201_1_2"> </A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="oe1201_section_1_introduction"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_oe1201_2"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>SECTION 1<BR>  <BR>    INTRODUCTION    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Definitions</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;When the following terms are used herein with initial capital letters, they shall have the
following meanings: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Accounts</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the following Accounts will be maintained under the Plan for Participants: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><B>Total Account</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;for convenience of reference, the separate unfunded and unsecured general
obligation of the Employer established with respect to each person who is a Participant in the Plan in accordance with Section&nbsp;2, including the Participant's Excess Savings Account, Fixed Match
Account, Performance Match Account and Transition Benefit Account. </FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><B>Excess Savings Account</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the bookkeeping account maintained for each Participant to which is
credited the voluntary deferral amounts specified in Section&nbsp;3.1. </FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><B>Fixed Match Account</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the bookkeeping account maintained for each Participant to which
is
credited the fixed matching contribution amounts specified in Section&nbsp;3.2. </FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(d)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><B>Performance Match Account</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the bookkeeping account maintained for each
Participant to which
is credited the performance matching contribution amounts specified in Section&nbsp;3.3. </FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(e)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><B>Transition Benefit Account</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the bookkeeping account maintained for
each Participant to which
is credited the amount specified in Section&nbsp;3.4. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>
</UL>
<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.2&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Affiliate</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;a business entity which is under "common control" with the Employer or which is a member of an
"affiliated service group" that includes the Employer, as those terms are defined in section&nbsp;414(b), (c)&nbsp;and (m)&nbsp;of the Code. A business entity, which is a predecessor to the
Employer, shall be treated as an Affiliate if the Employer maintains a plan of such predecessor business entity or if, and to the extent that, such treatment is otherwise required by regulations under
section&nbsp;414(a) of the Code. A business entity shall also be treated as an Affiliate if, and to the extent that, such treatment is required by regulations under section&nbsp;414(o) of the
Code. In addition to said required treatment, the Principal Sponsor may, in its discretion, designate as an Affiliate any business entity which is not such a
"common control," "affiliated service group" or "predecessor" business entity but which is otherwise affiliated with the Employer, subject to such limitations as the Principal Sponsor may impose. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Annual Enrollment Period</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the time period designated by the ADC Telecommunications,&nbsp;Inc. Corporate
Benefits Department during which eligible employees may, pursuant to rules established by the ADC Telecommunications,&nbsp;Inc. Corporate Benefits Department, enroll in the Plan as Participants or
change their deferral percentages under the Plan. An Annual Enrollment Period for a Plan Year will end no later than December&nbsp;31 of the preceding Plan Year. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Annual Valuation Date</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;each December&nbsp;31. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Beneficiary</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;a person designated by a Participant (or automatically by operation of this Plan Statement) to
receive all or a part of the Participant's Total Account in the event of the Participant's death prior to full distribution thereof. A person so designated becomes a Beneficiary after the death of the
Participant with respect to whom the person is a Beneficiary. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Code</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, including applicable regulations for the specified section of the
Code. Any reference in this Plan Statement to a section of the Code, including the applicable regulation, shall be considered also to mean and refer to any later amendment or replacement of that
section or regulation. </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>2</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=6,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=321019,FOLIO='2',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OE1201A.;10',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:46' -->
<A NAME="page_oe1201_1_3"> </A>
<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Committee</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the Committee known as the ADC Retirement Committee, referred to in this Plan Statement as
Committee or Retirement Committee. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.8&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Compensation</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;Recognized Compensation as defined in the ADC Retirement Savings Plan, but for purposes of
this Plan, determined without regard to the limitation in section&nbsp;401(a)(17) of the Code ($200,000 in 2002, and as subsequently adjusted for inflation). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.9&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Disability</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;a physical or mental condition resulting from injury or illness which is of such a nature that
it constitutes total disability as defined for purposes of the group long-term disability insurance program maintained by the Employer, whether or not the individual is actually covered by
such group long-term disability insurance program. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.10&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Effective Date</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;September&nbsp;1, 1990. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.11&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Employer</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the Principal Sponsor, any business entity affiliated with the Principal Sponsor that adopts the
Plan, and any successor thereof that adopts the Plan. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.12&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>ERISA</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, including applicable regulations for the
specified section of ERISA. Any reference in this Plan Statement to a section of ERISA, including the applicable regulation, shall be considered also to mean and refer to any subsequent amendment or
replacement of that section or regulation. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.13&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Excess Compensation</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;Compensation for a Plan Year that exceeds the limitations in section&nbsp;401(a)(17)
of the Code for such Plan Year ($200,000 in 2002, and as subsequently adjusted for inflation). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.14&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Excess Savings Agreement</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the agreement which may be entered into by a Participant as provided in
Section&nbsp;2.2. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.15&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Event of Maturity</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;any of the occurrences described in Section&nbsp;6 by reason of which a Participant or
Beneficiary may become entitled to a distribution from the Plan. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.16&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Participant</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;an employee of the Employer who has satisfied the eligibility rules in Section&nbsp;2 and
receives a credit under an Account pursuant to the rules of Section&nbsp;3. An employee who has become a Participant shall be considered to continue as a Participant in the Plan until the
Participant's date of death or if earlier, the date upon which the Participant is no longer employed in Recognized Employment and upon which the Participant no longer has any Account under the Plan
(that is, the Participant has both received a distribution of all of the Participant's Total Account, if any). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.17&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Plan</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the program of deferred compensation and supplemental retirement income benefit of the Employer
established for the benefit of employees eligible to participate therein, as first set forth in this Plan Statement. (As used herein, "Plan" refers to the legal entity established by the Employer and
not to the document pursuant to which the Plan is maintained. That document is referred to herein as the "Plan Statement.") The Plan shall be referred to as the ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS,&nbsp;INC.
401(k) EXCESS PLAN." </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.18&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Plan Statement</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;this document entitled ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS,&nbsp;INC. 401(k) EXCESS PLAN (2002
Restatement)" as adopted by the Principal Sponsor effective as of January&nbsp;1, 2002, as the same may be amended from time to time thereafter. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.19&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Plan Year</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the twelve (12)&nbsp;consecutive month period ending on any Annual Valuation Date. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.20&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Principal Sponsor</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS,&nbsp;INC., a Minnesota corporation. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.21&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Recognized Employment</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;employment as a common law employee of the Employer in a position which is: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>classified
as Recognized Employment under the Retirement Savings Plan; and </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>3</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=7,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=776330,FOLIO='3',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OE1201B.;6',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:46' -->
<A NAME="page_oe1201_1_4"> </A>
<UL>
<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>is
at a salary grade for which the midpoint plus annual target cash incentive normally results in total target cash compensation equal to or greater
than the Code section&nbsp;401(a)(17) compensation limit which is $200,000 in 2002 (and is periodically adjusted under the Code for cost of living increases.) </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Employer's classification of a person at the time of inclusion or exclusion in Recognized Employment shall be conclusive for the purpose of the foregoing rules. No reclassification
of a person's status with the Employer, for any reason, without regard to whether it is initiated by a court, governmental agency or otherwise and without regard to whether or not the Employer agrees
to such reclassification, shall result in the person being included in Recognized Employment, either retroactively or prospectively. Any uncertainty concerning a person's classification shall be
resolved by excluding the person from Recognized Employment. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.22&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Retirement Savings Plan</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the tax qualified defined contribution plan of the Principal Sponsor established
for the benefit of employees eligible to participate therein, as set forth in the document entitled "ADC RETIREMENT SAVINGS PLAN TRUST AGREEMENT (1999 Restatement)" as adopted by the Principal Sponsor
effective as of April&nbsp;1, 1999, as the same may be amended from time to time thereafter. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.23&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Unit Share</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;a bookkeeping unit which is the equivalent of one (1)&nbsp;share of common stock of the
Principal Sponsor. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.24&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Valuation Date</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;the Annual Valuation Date and any day during which the New York Stock Exchange is open for
business or any other date chosen by the Committee. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1.25&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>Vested</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&#151;nonforfeitable, </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>i.e.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, a claim obtained by a
Participant or the Participant's Beneficiary to that part of an immediate or deferred benefit hereunder which arises from the Participant's service, which is unconditional and which is legally
enforceable against the Plan. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Rules of Interpretation</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;An individual shall be considered to have attained a given age on the individual's
birthday for that age (and not on the day before). The birthday of any individual born on a February&nbsp;29 shall be deemed to be February&nbsp;28 in any year that is not a leap year.
Notwithstanding any other provision of this Plan Statement or any election or designation made under the Plan, any individual who feloniously and intentionally kills a Participant or Beneficiary shall
be deemed for all purposes of this Plan and all elections and designations made under this Plan to have died before such Participant or Beneficiary. A final judgment of conviction of felonious and
intentional killing is conclusive for the purposes of this Section. In the absence of a conviction of felonious and intentional killing, the Employer shall determine whether the killing was felonious
and intentional for the purposes of this Section. Whenever appropriate, words used herein in the singular may be read in the plural, or words used herein in the plural may be read in the singular; and
the words "hereof", "herein" or "hereunder" or other similar compounds of the word "here" shall mean and refer to this entire Plan Statement and not to any particular paragraph or Section of this Plan
Statement unless the context clearly indicates to the contrary. The titles given to the various Sections of this Plan Statement are inserted for convenience of reference only and are not part of this
Plan Statement, and they shall not be considered in determining the purpose, meaning or intent of any provision hereof. Any reference in this Plan Statement to a statute or regulation shall be
considered also to mean and refer to any subsequent amendment or replacement of that statute or regulation. This document has been adopted in the State of Minnesota and has been drawn in conformity to
the laws of that State and shall, except to the extent that federal law is controlling, be construed and enforced in accordance with the laws of the State of Minnesota. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.3</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Transitional Rules</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Employer may adopt such transition rules as necessary to implement the Plan
Statement effective January&nbsp;1, 2002, including, but not limited to, permitting the execution of Excess Savings Agreements prior to that date. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>4</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=4,SEQ=8,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=694850,FOLIO='4',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OE1201B.;6',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:46' -->
<!-- Generated by Merrill Corporation (www.merrillcorp.com) -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_og1201_1_5"> </A> </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="og1201_section_2_eligibility_and_enrollment"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_og1201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>SECTION 2<BR>  <BR>    ELIGIBILITY AND ENROLLMENT    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Eligibility</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;An employee is eligible to enroll in this Plan for a Plan Year if such employee: (i)&nbsp;is
in Recognized Employment on the November&nbsp;1 immediately proceeding such Plan Year; and (ii)&nbsp;is selected by the Committee to participate in the Plan for such Plan Year. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Special Eligibility Rule for Employees Eligible as of November&nbsp;1, 2000</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything to
the contrary, any employee who was eligible to participate in this Plan on or before November&nbsp;1, 2000 shall remain eligible to participate in this Plan for each Plan Year following
December&nbsp;31, 2000 until such Participant's Event of Maturity pursuant to Section&nbsp;6 of this Plan. Employees who are eligible to participate in this Plan pursuant to this rule shall not be
subject to the automatic cancellation rules in Section&nbsp;2.4. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.3</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Special Eligibility Rule for Transition Benefit</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any employee of the Employer or an Affiliate who, in a Plan
Year, receives: (i)&nbsp;Excess Compensation and (ii)&nbsp;a Transition Benefit under the ADC Retirement Savings Plan shall be eligible for a contribution under this Plan. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.4</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Excess Savings Agreement</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;To enroll for participation in this Plan, an eligible employee must complete an
Excess Savings Agreement and deliver it to the Employer during the Annual Enrollment Period for the Plan Year in which the employee desires to participate in the Plan. Subject to the provisions of
Section&nbsp;2.4.2 and Section&nbsp;2.4.3, an employee's Excess Savings Agreement shall remain in effect for each subsequent Plan Year. </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.4.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Deferral Percentages</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Elections for Excess Savings Additions may be made in
increments of one percent (1%) and shall be equal to not less than one percent (1%) nor more than fifteen percent (15%) of the amount of the employee's Compensation. Such elections may be changed
during any Annual Enrollment Period. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.4.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Automatic Cancellation</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;An employee's Excess Savings Agreement shall be
automatically cancelled upon the Participant's termination of employment or, if the Participant remains an employee of the Employer but is no longer in Recognized Employment, the employee's Excess
Savings Agreement shall be automatically cancelled effective as of December&nbsp;31 of the Plan Year in which the employee is no longer eligible to participate in this Plan. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.4.3</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Voluntary Cancellation</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;An eligible employee who has an Excess Savings Agreement
in effect may cancel completely the Excess Savings Agreement as of any December&nbsp;31. Written notice of the cancellation must be delivered to the Employer during the Annual Enrollment Period for
the Plan Year in which the employee desires the cancellation to be effective. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.4.4</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Form of Agreement</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Employer shall specify the form of the Excess Savings
Agreement, the form of any notices modifying the Excess Savings Agreement, and all procedures for the delivery and acceptance of forms and notices. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.4.5</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Employer Administrative Error</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything in this Section to the
contrary, the Employer, in its sole discretion, may modify or accept an eligible employee's Excess Savings Agreement during the Plan Year if the modification is necessary to correct an administrative
error made by the Employer or if the Plan Administrator has failed to initially enroll the Participant as of January&nbsp;1. However, such modification shall only be to the extent necessary to
correct the error. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.5</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Specific Exclusion</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding anything apparently to the contrary in the Plan or in any written
communication, summary, resolution or document or oral communication, no individual shall be a Participant in the Plan, develop benefits under the Plan or be entitled to receive benefits under the
Plan (either for the individual or the individual's survivors) unless such individual is a </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>5</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=9,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=673158,FOLIO='5',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OG1201A.;6',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->
<A NAME="page_og1201_1_6"> </A>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
member of a select group of management or highly compensated employees (as that expression is used in ERISA). If a court of competent jurisdiction, any representative of the U.S. Department of Labor
or any other governmental, regulatory or similar body makes any direct or indirect, formal or informal, determination that an individual is not a member of a select group of management or highly
compensated employees (as that expression is used in ERISA), such individual shall not be (and shall not have ever been) a Participant in the Plan at any time. If any individual not so defined has
been erroneously treated as a Participant in the Plan, upon discovery of such error such individual's erroneous participation shall immediately terminate </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>ab
initio</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> and upon demand such individual shall be obligated to reimburse the Principal Sponsor for all amounts erroneously paid to that individual. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>6</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=10,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=639342,FOLIO='6',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OG1201A.;6',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->
<!-- Generated by Merrill Corporation (www.merrillcorp.com) -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_oi1201_1_7"> </A> </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="oi1201_section_3_additions_to_accounts"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_oi1201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>SECTION 3<BR>  <BR>    ADDITIONS TO ACCOUNTS    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Excess Savings Additions</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.1.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Amount</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Employer shall credit each Participant's Excess Savings Account with
the amount of deferred Compensation agreed to by each Participant pursuant to the Participant's Excess Savings Agreement. No excess savings additions shall be credited to an eligible employee's
account for a Plan Year prior to the date the employee has either: (i)&nbsp;contributed the maximum amount of voluntary pretax elective deferrals to the Retirement Savings Plan allowable under
Section&nbsp;402(g) of the Code for the Plan Year; or (ii)&nbsp;earned Compensation that exceeds the limitations in Section&nbsp;401(a)(17) of the Code for such Plan Year. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.1.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Crediting the Account</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The amount of Excess Compensation deferred with respect to
each Participant shall be credited in dollar amounts to the Participant's Excess Savings Account as soon as administratively practicable following the last payroll cycle of a month for which the
Compensation was deferred. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Fixed Match Additions</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.2.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Amount</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Employer shall credit each eligible Participant's Fixed Match Account
with an amount equal to one hundred percent (100%) of the first six percent (6%) of reduction in Excess Compensation for each pay period which was agreed to by the Participant pursuant to an Excess
Savings Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.2.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Crediting the Account</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The fixed match addition which is made with respect to a
Participant shall be credited in dollar amounts to the Participant's Match Account as soon as administratively practicable following the last payroll cycle of a month for which the fixed match is
made. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.2.3</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Eligible Participant</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;For purposes of this Section&nbsp;3.2, a Participant shall
be an "Eligible Participant" for a Plan Year for any payroll cycle beginning after the date such Participant has completed one year of Eligibility Service (as determined under the Retirement Savings
Plan) with the Employer or an Affiliate. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.3</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Performance Match Additions</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.3.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Amount</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Each Plan Year, the Employer may (but shall not be required to) credit to
each eligible Participant's Performance Match Account a percentage of the eligible Participant's Excess Compensation that is determined each Plan Year. The percentage shall be the performance match
percentage, if any, determined for making performance match contributions for the Plan Year under the Retirement Savings Plan. The amount, if any, credited to each eligible Participant's Performance
Match Account for a Plan Year shall be a percentage (equal to the Performance Match Contribution percentage under the Retirement Savings Plan for such Plan Year) of the first six percent (6%)
reduction in Excess Compensation under this Plan which was agreed to by the Participant pursuant to an Excess Savings Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.3.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Crediting the Account</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The performance match addition which is made with respect
to an eligible Participant shall be credited in dollar amounts to the Participant's Performance Match Account as soon as administratively practicable following the Annual Valuation Date in the Plan
Year for which the addition is made. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.3.3</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Eligible Participant</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;For purposes of this Section&nbsp;3.3, a Participant shall
be an "eligible Participant" for a Plan Year only if such Participant is on the last day of such Plan Year an employee of the Employer or an Affiliate (including for this purpose any Participant who
then is on temporary layoff or authorized leave of absence or who, during such Plan Year, was inducted </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>7</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=11,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=415015,FOLIO='7',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OI1201A.;6',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->
<A NAME="page_oi1201_1_8"> </A>
<UL>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
into the Armed Forces of the United States from employment with the Employer) and, prior to or during such Plan Year, the Participant has completed one year of Eligibility Service (as determined
under the Retirement Savings Plan) with the Employer or an Affiliate. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.4</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Transition Benefit</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.4.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Amount</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;For a Plan Year in which an employee is eligible for a transition benefit
under this Plan, the Employer shall credit a Transition Benefit Account established for such employee with an addition equal to the employee's Excess Compensation for such Plan Year multiplied by the
transition benefit percentage determined for such employee under the Retirement Savings Plan for such Plan Year. However, any transition benefit to be allocated and credited to a Participant's Account
which is in
excess of the maximum permissible addition which would have been contributed on behalf of the Participant under the Retirement Savings Plan but for the limitation on annual additions imposed under
section&nbsp;415 of the Code shall be credited not to this Plan but to the ADC Telecommunications,&nbsp;Inc. Supplemental Retirement Plan. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.4.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Crediting the Account</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The transition benefit addition which is made with respect
to a Participant shall be credited in dollar amounts to the Participant's Transition Benefit Account as soon as administratively practicable following the last day of the calendar month for which the
addition is made. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;3.5</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Nonduplication of Benefits</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Plan shall be construed to prevent the duplication of benefits provided
under any other plan or arrangement, whether qualified or nonqualified, funded or unfunded, to the extent that such other benefits are provided directly or indirectly by the Employer. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>8</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=12,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=873477,FOLIO='8',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OI1201A.;6',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->
<!-- Generated by Merrill Corporation (www.merrillcorp.com) -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_ok1201_1_9"> </A> </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ok1201_section_4_establishment_and_adjustment_of_accounts"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ok1201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>SECTION 4<BR>  <BR>    ESTABLISHMENT AND ADJUSTMENT OF ACCOUNTS    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.1.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Participant Accounts</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.1.1.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Establishment of Accounts</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee shall cause a bookkeeping account to be
kept in the name of each Participant which shall reflect the value the Participant deferral additions, fixed match additions, performance match additions, transition benefit additions, and any
earnings thereon, credited to each Account of a Participant. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.1.2.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Adjustment of Accounts</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee shall cause the value of each Account to be
increased (or decreased) from time to time for distributions, additions, investment gains (or losses) and expenses charged to the Account. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.1.3.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Investment of Accounts</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Except as provided in Sections 4.2 and 4.3, amounts
credited to a Participant's Account will be adjusted for gains and losses to the same extent that equal amounts would have been adjusted if they had been invested as directed by the Participant in the
subfund or subfunds designated by the Committee. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.1.4.</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Rules</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee shall establish additional rules for the adjustment of
Accounts, including the times when additions shall be credited under Section&nbsp;3 for the purpose of crediting gains or losses under this Section&nbsp;4. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Dividend Adjustment for Phantom Stock</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;At such time that dividends are paid on common stock of the Employer,
the Unit Shares credited to the Participant's Account, if any, shall be increased by crediting in Unit Shares the amount of the dividend which would have been paid if the number of Unit Shares had
been shares of common stock of the Employer. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.3</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Antidilution Adjustment for Phantom Stock</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In the event that the outstanding shares of stock of the
Employer, of whatever class or series, are increased, decreased or changed into or exchanged for a different number or kind of shares or other securities of the Employer or of another corporation by
reason of any reorganization, merger, consolidation, recapitalization, reclassification, stock split-up, combination of shares, stock dividends or otherwise, then the number of Unit Shares
credited to the Participant's Account, if any, shall be adjusted so that the resulting number of Unit Shares shall be in the same ratio to the original number of Unit Shares as the number of shares of
stock of the Employer, of whatever class or series, outstanding immediately after the transaction described above giving rise to an adjustment hereunder bears to the number of shares of stock of the
Employer, of whatever class or series, outstanding immediately prior to the transaction. Adjustments shall be made as are necessary to prevent dilution or enlargement of the benefits credited under
the Plan. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;4.4</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Not Funded</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The obligations of the Employer to make payments under this Plan constitutes only the unsecured
(but legally enforceable) promise of the Employer to make such payments, and the Participant shall have no lien, prior claim or other security interest in any property of the Employer. No fund, trust
or account (other than a bookkeeping account or reserve) will be established or maintained by the Employer for the purpose of funding or paying the benefits promised under this Plan. If such a fund is
established, the property therein shall remain the sole and exclusive property of the Employer. The Employer will pay the cost of the Plan out of its general assets. All references to accounts,
accruals, gains, losses, income, expenses, payments, custodial funds and the like are included merely for the purpose of measuring the Employer's obligation to Participants in the Plan and shall not
be construed to impose on the Employer the obligation to create any separate fund for purposes of the Plan. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>9</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=13,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=87943,FOLIO='9',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OK1201A.;5',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->
<A NAME="page_ok1201_1_10"> </A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ok1201_section_5_vesting_accounts"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ok1201_2"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>SECTION 5<BR>  <BR>    VESTING ACCOUNTS    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;5.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Full Vesting</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;The Accounts of each Participant shall be fully (100%) Vested at all times. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>10</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=14,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=313757,FOLIO='10',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OK1201A.;5',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->
<A NAME="page_ok1201_1_11"> </A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ok1201_section_6_maturity"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ok1201_3"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>SECTION 6<BR>  <BR>    MATURITY    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;6.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Events of Maturity</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A Participant's Total Account shall mature and shall become distributable in accordance
with Section&nbsp;7 upon the earliest occurrence of any of the following events while in the employment of the Employer of an Affiliate: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>the
Participant's death,
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>the
Participant's termination of employment, whether voluntary or involuntary,
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>the
Participant's Disability, or
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(d)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>termination
of the Plan; </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>provided,
however, that a transfer from Recognized Employment to employment with the Employer or an Affiliate that is other than Recognized Employment shall not constitute an Event of Maturity. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;6.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Effect of Maturity upon Further Participation in Plan</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;On the occurrence of an Event of Maturity, a
Participant shall cease to have any interest in the Plan other than the right to receive payment of all Accounts as provided in Section&nbsp;7, adjusted from time to time as provided in
Section&nbsp;4. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>11</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=15,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=684011,FOLIO='11',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OK1201A.;5',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="om1201_section_7_distribution"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_om1201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>SECTION 7<BR>  <BR>    DISTRIBUTION    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Time of Distribution</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon the occurrence of an Event of Maturity effective as to a Participant, the
Employer shall make or commence distribution of the Participant's Total Account (reduced by the amount of any applicable payroll, withholding and other taxes) as of one of the following times as the
Participant shall designate in writing prior to the first Plan Year in which the Participant first receives additions to the Participant's Accounts. </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><B>Annual Valuation Date</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Distribution may be made or commenced as of the Annual Valuation Date coincident
with or next following the Event of Maturity. Actual distribution shall be made or commenced in the calendar month immediately following the Annual Valuation Date or as soon thereafter as
administratively feasible.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><B>Quarterly Valuation Date</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Distribution may be made or commenced as of the quarterly Valuation Date
coincident with or next following the Event of Maturity. Actual distribution shall be made or commenced in the calendar month immediately following the quarterly Valuation Date or as soon thereafter
as administratively feasible. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Modification of Initial Designation and Failure to Designate</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>A
Participant may rescind the initial designation of the form of distribution made pursuant to Sections 7.1 and 7.3 by making a new designation on a form
designated by the Employer, provided that such new designation is made no later than the last day of the second Plan Year preceding the Plan Year in which distribution is to commence. (By way of
example, a participation who receives a distribution in 2002 must make a new designation no later than December&nbsp;31, 2000 for the new designation to be effective.)
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>A
Participant who fails to designate a time and form of distribution shall receive their distribution in a single lump sum (pursuant to the rules of
Sections 7.1 and 7.3) as of the quarterly Valuation Date coincident with or next following their Event of Maturity. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.3</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Forms of Distribution</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Distribution of the Participant's Total Account shall be made to the Participant or
the Beneficiary entitled to receive distribution (the "Distributee") in one of the following ways as the Participant shall designate in writing prior to the first Plan Year in which the Participant
first receives additions to the Participant's Accounts. </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><B>Lump Sum</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. If the Distributee is either a Participant or a Beneficiary, in a single lump sum.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2><B>Five Annual Installments</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. If the Distributee is a Participant, in a series of substantially equal
installments payable annually over a term of five (5)&nbsp;years. If the Distributee is a Beneficiary of a Participant and distribution had commenced to the Participant over a five (5)&nbsp;year
period, in a series of substantially equal installments payable annually over the remainder of the five (5)&nbsp;year period. If the Distributee is a Beneficiary of a Participant and distribution
had not commenced prior to the Participant's death, in a series of substantially equal installments payable annually over a term of five (5)&nbsp;years. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>The
amount of the installment distribution to be made in substantially equal annual installments shall be determined by dividing the Account value as of the Valuation Date of the installment
distribution by the number of remaining installments (including the installment being computed). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.4</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Distribution in Cash</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Employer shall make or commence distribution of the Participant's Total Account in
cash. The portion of the Participant's Account credited with Unit Shares of phantom stock to be distributed as of a Valuation Date shall be converted to a dollar amount based on the price of ADC
Telecommunications,&nbsp;Inc. common stock on the NASDAQ as of the close of the NYSE. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>12</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=16,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=96087,FOLIO='12',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OM1201A.;8',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->
<A NAME="page_om1201_1_13"> </A>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.5</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Designation of Beneficiaries</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.5.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Right To Designate</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Each Participant may designate, upon forms to be furnished by
and filed with the Employer, one or more primary Beneficiaries or alternative Beneficiaries to receive all of a specified part of the Participant's Total Account in the event of the Participant's
death. The Participant may change or revoke any such designation from time to time without notice to or consent from any Beneficiary or spouse. No such designation, change or revocation shall be
effective unless executed by the Participant and received by the Employer during the Participant's lifetime. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.5.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Failure of Designation</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If a Participant: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>fails
to designate a Beneficiary,
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>designates
a Beneficiary and thereafter such designation is revoked without another Beneficiary being named, or
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>designates
one or more Beneficiaries and all such Beneficiaries so designated fail to survive the Participant, </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>such
Participant's Total Account, or the part thereof as to which such Participant's designation fails, as the case may be, shall be payable to the first class of the following classes of automatic
Beneficiaries with a member surviving the Participant and (except in the case of the Participant's surviving issue) in equal shares if there is more than one member in such class surviving the
Participant: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>Participant's
surviving spouse<BR>
Participant's surviving issue per stirpes and not per capita<BR>
Participant's surviving parents<BR>
Participant's surviving brothers and sisters<BR>
Representative of Participant's estate. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.5.3</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Disclaimers of Beneficiaries</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A Beneficiary entitled to a distribution of all or a
portion of a deceased Participant's Total Account may disclaim his or her interest therein subject to the following requirements. To be eligible to disclaim, a Beneficiary must be a natural person,
must not have received a distribution of all or any portion of a Total Account at the time such disclaimer is executed and delivered, and must have attained at least age twenty-one
(21)&nbsp;years as of the date of the Participant's death. Any disclaimer must be in writing and must be executed personally by the Beneficiary before a notary public. A disclaimer shall state that
the Beneficiary's entire interest in the undistributed Total Account is disclaimed or shall specify what portion thereof is disclaimed. To be effective, duplicate original executed copies of the
disclaimer must be both executed and actually delivered to the Employer after the date of the Participant's death but not later than nine (9)&nbsp;months after the date of the Participant's death. A
disclaimer shall be irrevocable when delivered to the Employer. A disclaimer shall be considered to be delivered to the Employer only when actually received by the Employer. The Employer shall be the
sole judge of the content, interpretation and validity of a purported disclaimer. Upon the filing of a valid disclaimer, the Beneficiary shall be considered not to have survived the Participant as to
the interest disclaimed. A disclaimer by a Beneficiary shall not be considered to be a transfer of an interest in violation of the provisions of Section&nbsp;8 and shall not be considered to be an
assignment or alienation of benefits in violation of federal law prohibiting the assignment of alienation
of benefits under this Plan. No other form of attempted disclaimer shall be recognized by the Employer. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.5.4</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Definitions</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;When used herein and, unless the Participant has otherwise specified
in his or her Beneficiary designation, when used in a Beneficiary designation, "issue" means all </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>13</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=17,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=123454,FOLIO='13',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OM1201A.;8',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->
<A NAME="page_om1201_1_14"> </A>
<UL>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
persons who are lineal descendants of the person whose issue are referred to, including legally adopted descendants and their descendants but not including illegitimate descendants and their
descendants; "child" means an issue of the first generation; "per stirpes" means in equal shares among living children of the person whose issue are referred to and the issue (taken collectively) of
each deceased child of such person, with such issue taking by right of representation of such deceased child; and "survive" and "surviving" mean living after the death of the Participant. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.5.5</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Special Rules</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Unless the Participant has otherwise specified in his or her
Beneficiary designation, the following rules shall apply: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>If
there is not sufficient evidence that a Beneficiary was living at the time of the death of the Participant, it shall be deemed that the Beneficiary
was not living at the time of the death of the Participant.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>The
automatic Beneficiaries specified in Section&nbsp;7.5.2. and the Beneficiaries designated by the Participant shall become fixed at the time of the
Participant's death so that, if a Beneficiary survives the Participant but dies before the receipt of all payments due such Beneficiary hereunder, such remaining payments shall be payable to the
representative of such Beneficiary's estate.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>If
the participant designates as a Beneficiary the person who is the Participant's spouse on the date of the designation, either by name or by
relationship, or both, the dissolution, annulment or the legal termination of marriage between the Participant and such person shall automatically revoke such designation. (The foregoing shall not
prevent the Participant from designation a former spouse as a Beneficiary on a form executed by the Participant and received by the Employer after the date of the legal termination of marriage between
the Participant and such former spouse, and during the Participant's lifetime.)
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(d)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Any
designation of a nonspouse Beneficiary by name that is accompanied by a description of relationship to the Participant shall be given effect without
regard to whether the relationship to the Participant exists either then or at the Participant's death.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(e)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Any
designation of a Beneficiary only by Statement of relationship to the Participant shall be effective only to designate the person or persons
standing in such relationship to the Participant at the Participant's death. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>
</UL>
<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>A
Beneficiary designation is permanently void if it either is executed or is filed by a Participant who, at the time of such execution or filing, is then a minor under the law of the state of the
Participant's legal residence. The employer shall be the sole judge of the content, interpretation and validity of a purported Beneficiary designation. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.5.6</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Spousal Rights</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No spouse or surviving spouse of a Participant and no person
designated to be a Beneficiary shall have any rights or interest in the benefits accumulated under the Plan including, but not limited to, the right to be the sole Beneficiary or to consent to the
designation of Beneficiaries (or the changing of designated Beneficiaries) by the Participant. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.6</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Death Prior to Full Distribution</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;If a Participant dies after an Event of Maturity but before distribution
of the Participant's Total Account has been completed, the remainder of the undistributed Total Account shall be distributed in the same manner as herein before provided in the Event of Maturity by
reason of death. If, at the death of the Participant, any payment to the Participant was due or otherwise pending but not actually paid, the amount of such payment shall be included in the Total
Account which is payable to the Beneficiary (and shall not be paid to the Participant's estate). </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>14</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=18,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=923229,FOLIO='14',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OM1201A.;8',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->
<A NAME="page_om1201_1_15"> </A>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;7.7</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Facility of Payment</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;In case of the legal disability, including minority, or a Participant or Beneficiary
entitled to receive any distribution under the Plan, payment shall be made, if the Employer shall be advised of the existence of such condition: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>to
the duly appointed guardian, conservator or other legal representative of such Participant or Beneficiary, or
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>to
a person or institution entrusted with the care or maintenance of the incompetent or disabled Participant or Beneficiary, provided such person or
institution has satisfied the Employer that the payment will be used for the best interest and assist in the care of such Participant or Beneficiary, and provided further, that no prior claim for said
payment has been made by a duly appointed guardian, conservator or other legal representative of such Participant of Beneficiary. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>Any
payment made in accordance with the foregoing provisions of this Section shall constitute a complete discharge of any liability or obligation of the Employer. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>15</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=4,SEQ=19,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=213124,FOLIO='15',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OM1201A.;8',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->
<!-- Generated by Merrill Corporation (www.merrillcorp.com) -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_oo1201_1_16"> </A> </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="oo1201_section_8_spendthrift_provisions"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_oo1201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>SECTION 8<BR>  <BR>    SPENDTHRIFT PROVISIONS    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No Participant or Beneficiary shall have any transmissible interest in any Account nor shall any Participant or Beneficiary have any power to anticipate,
alienate, dispose of, pledge or encumber the same while in possession or control of the Employer, nor shall the Employer recognize any assignment thereof, either in whole or in part, nor shall any
Account be subject to attachment, garnishment, execution following judgment or other legal process while in the possession or control of the Employer. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
power to designate Beneficiaries to receive the Total Account of a Participant in the event of the Participant's death shall not permit or be construed to permit such power or right
to be exercised by the Participant so as thereby to anticipate, pledge, mortgage or encumber the Participant's Account or any part thereof, and any attempt of a Participant so to exercise said power
in violation of this provision shall be of no force and effect and shall be disregarded by the Employer. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This
Section shall not prevent the Employer from exercising, in its discretion, any of the applicable powers and options granted to them upon the occurrence of an Event of Maturity, as
such powers may be conferred upon them by any provision hereof. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>16</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=20,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=507969,FOLIO='16',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OO1201A.;5',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->
<A NAME="page_oo1201_1_17"> </A>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="oo1201_section_9_amendment_and_termination"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_oo1201_2"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>SECTION 9<BR>  <BR>    AMENDMENT AND TERMINATION    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;9.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Amendment and Termination</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Compensation and Organization Committee of the Board of Directors of ADC
Telecommunications,&nbsp;Inc. hereby reserves the power to unilaterally amend the Plan
Statement and to partially terminate or totally terminate the Plan and to reduce, suspend or discontinue its additions to the Plan, either prospectively or retroactively or both; provided that no
amendment or termination shall be effective to reduce or divest the Accounts of any Participant without such Participant's consent. The Retirement Committee is authorized to amend the Plan Statement
in any respect that does not materially increase the cost of the Plan. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;9.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Change in Control</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;9.2.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>In General</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding any other provision of the Plan Statement,
Section&nbsp;9.2.3, Section&nbsp;9.2.4, Section&nbsp;9.2.5 and Section&nbsp;9.2.6 shall take effect if and only if a Maturity Date (as defined in Appendix&nbsp;A) defined in the Retirement
Savings Plan) occurs effective as to this Plan following a Change in Control. A Maturity Date cannot occur if there is no Change in Control. A Maturity Date effective as to this Plan does not occur
merely because there is a Change in Control or merely because a Maturity Date occurs effective as to the Retirement Savings Plan. A Maturity Date following a Change in Control must be effective as to
this Plan. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;9.2.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Special Definitions</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;For purposes of this Section&nbsp;9.2, the special
definitions in Appendix&nbsp;A attached hereto shall apply. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;9.2.3</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Amendment</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding any other provision of the Plan Statement, during the
two (2)&nbsp;years following the date of a Change in Control, the provisions of the Plan Statement may not be amended if any amendment would adversely affect the rights, expectancies or benefits
provided by the Plan (as in effect immediately prior to the Change in Control), of any Participant, Beneficiary or other person entitled to payments under the Plan. The Plan may not be terminated or
merged with any other plan during the same two (2)&nbsp;year period. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;9.2.4</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Termination of Employment</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding any other provision of the Plan
Statement, the Total Account of any Participant actively employed on the date of a Change in Control who terminates employment for any reason including Good Reason, death, disability (as defined in
section&nbsp;22(e)(3) of the Code) or Cause during the two (2)&nbsp;years following the date of the Change in Control shall be distributed in a single lump sum cash payment as soon as
administratively feasible after such termination. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;9.2.5</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Pending Distributions</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding any other provision of the Plan Statement,
any distribution (whether lump sum or installment) which is pending but which has not actually been made or commenced on the date of a Change in Control shall be distributed in a single lump sum cash
payment as soon as administratively feasible after the date of the Change of Control. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;9.2.6</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Commutation of Installments</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding any other provision of the Plan
Statement, any remaining installments due to any Participant who terminated employment before the date of a Change
of Control shall be distributed in a single lump sum cash payment as soon as administratively feasible after the date of the Change of Control. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;9.2.7</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Not Amendable</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Notwithstanding any other provision of the Plan Statement, this
Section&nbsp;9.2 may not be amended to decrease any of the benefits which it provides during the two (2)&nbsp;years following the date of a Change in Control without the affirmative written
consent of a majority in both number and interest of the Participants actively employed on the date of the Change in Control. </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>17</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=21,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=823379,FOLIO='17',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OO1201A.;5',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->
<!-- Generated by Merrill Corporation (www.merrillcorp.com) -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="page_oq1201_1_18"> </A> </FONT></P>

<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="oq1201_section_10_administration"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_oq1201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>SECTION 10<BR>  <BR>    ADMINISTRATION    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;10.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Authority</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Plan shall be administered by the Committee, which shall have full discretionary power and
authority to administer and interpret the Plan and to determine all factual and legal questions under the Plan, including but not limited to the entitlement of Participants and Beneficiaries, and the
amount of their respective interests. The Committee may delegate or redelegate to one or more persons, jointly or severally, and whether or not such persons are members of the Committee or employees
of the Employer, such functions assigned to the Committee hereunder as it may from time to time deem advisable. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;10.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Liability</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No member of the Committee and no director or member of the management of the Employer shall be
liable to any persons for any actions taken under the Plan, or for any failure to effect any of the objective or purposes of the Plan, by reason of insolvency or otherwise. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;10.3</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Procedures</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee may from time to time adopt such rules and procedures as it deems appropriate to
assist in the administration of the Plan. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;10.4</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Claim for Benefits</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;No employee or other person shall have any claim or right to payment of any amount
hereunder until payment has been authorized and directed by the Committee. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;10.5</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Claims Procedure</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Until modified by the Committee, the claims procedure set forth in this
Section&nbsp;10.5 shall be the claims procedure for the resolution of disputes and disposition of claims arising under the Plan. </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;10.5.1</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Original Claim</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any employee, former employee, or Beneficiary of such employee or
former employee may, if the employee, former employee or Beneficiary so desires, file with the Committee a written claim for benefits under the Plan. Within ninety (90)&nbsp;days after the filing of
such a claim, the Committee shall notify the claimant in writing whether the claim is upheld or denied in whole or in
part or shall furnish the claimant a written notice describing specific special circumstances requiring a specified amount of additional time (but not more than one hundred eighty (180)&nbsp;days
from the date the claim was filed) to reach a decision on the claim. If the claim is denied in whole or in part, the Committee shall state in writing: </FONT></P>

<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>the
specific reasons for the denial,
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>the
specific references to the pertinent provisions of this Plan on which the denial is based,
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>a
description of any additional material or information necessary for the claimant to perfect the claim and an explanation of why such material or
information is necessary, and
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(d)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>an
explanation of the claims review procedure set forth in this Section. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;10.5.2</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>Claims Review Procedure</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Within sixty (60)&nbsp;days after receipt of notice
that the claim has been denied in whole or in part, the claimant may file with the Committee a written request for a review and may, in conjunction therewith, submit written issues and comments.
Within sixty (60)&nbsp;days after the filing of such a request for review, the Committee shall notify the claimant in writing whether, upon review, the claim was upheld or denied in whole or in part
or shall furnish the claimant a written notice describing specific special circumstances requiring a specified amount of additional time (but not more than one hundred twenty days (120)&nbsp;from
the date the request for review was filed) to reach a decision on the request for review. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;10.5.3</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>General Rules</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>18</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=22,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=144890,FOLIO='18',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OQ1201A.;7',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->
<A NAME="page_oq1201_1_19"> </A>
<UL>
<BR>
<UL>
<DL compact>
<DT><FONT SIZE=2>(a)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>No
inquiry or question shall be deemed to be a claim or a request for a review of a denied claim unless made in accordance with the claims procedure.
The Committee may require that any claim for benefits and any request for a review of a denied claim be filed on forms to be furnished by the Committee upon request.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(b)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>All
decisions on original claims shall be made by the Committee and requests for a review of denied claims shall be made by the Committee.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(c)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>The
Committee may, in its discretion, hold one or more hearings on a claim or a request for a review of a denied claim.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(d)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Claimants
may be represented by a lawyer or other representative at their own expense, but the Committee reserves the right to require the claimant to
furnish written authorization. A claimant's representative shall be entitled to copies of all notices given to the claimant.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(e)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>The
decision of the Committee on an original claim or on a request for a review of a denied claim shall be served on the claimant in writing. If a
decision or notice is not received by a claimant within the time specified, the claim or request for a review of a denied claim shall be deemed to have been denied.
<BR><BR></FONT></DD><DT><FONT SIZE=2>(f)</FONT></DT><DD><FONT SIZE=2>Prior
to filing a claim or a request for a review of a denied claim, the claimant or the claimant's representative shall have a reasonable opportunity
to review a copy of this Plan Statement and all other pertinent documents in the possession of the Employer and its Affiliates. </FONT></DD></DL>
</UL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;10.6</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><B>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Errors in Computations</B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Committee shall not be liable or responsible for any error in the computation
of any benefit payable to or with respect to any Participant resulting from any misstatement of fact made by the Participant or by or on behalf of any Beneficiary to whom such benefit shall be
payable, directly or indirectly, to the Committee, and used by the Committee in determining the benefit. The Committee shall not be obligated or required to increase the benefit payable to or with
respect to such Participant which, on discovery of the misstatement, is found to be understated as a result of such misstatement of the Participant. However, the benefit of any Participant which is
overstated by reason of any such misstatement or any other reason shall be reduced to the amount appropriate in view of the truth (and to recover any prior overpayment). </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>19</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=23,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="5",CHK=547656,FOLIO='19',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]OQ1201A.;7',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:50' -->
