<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit 10.cc  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kl1201_second_amendment_to_participation_agreement"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kl1201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>SECOND AMENDMENT TO<BR>  PARTICIPATION AGREEMENT    <BR></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS
SECOND AMENDMENT TO PARTICIPATION AGREEMENT, dated as of August&nbsp;24, 2001 (this " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Amendment  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), amends the Participation Agreement, dated as of October&nbsp;22, 1999, by and among ADC
Telecommunications,&nbsp;Inc., a Minnesota corporation, as Lessee; Lease Plan
North America,&nbsp;Inc., not in its individual capacity, except as expressly stated therein, but solely as Agent Lessor for the Participants; the Persons named on Schedule&nbsp;I thereto, as
Participants; and ABN AMRO Bank N.V., as Administrative Agent, as amended by the First Amendment to Participation Agreement, dated as of January&nbsp;29, 2001 (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>First Amendment  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") (as so amended
by the First Amendment, the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Participation Agreement  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"). Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined herein shall have the respective meanings assigned thereto in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the
Participation Agreement. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the parties hereto have entered into the Participation Agreement and the other Operative Documents to fund the Construction of the Financed Improvements on the Land; and </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the parties hereto desire to amend the Participation Agreement as hereinafter set forth; </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW,
THEREFORE, in consideration of the premises and for other good and valuable consideration (the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged), the parties hereto agree as
follows: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1 AMENDMENTS. Effective as of the date hereof and subject to the satisfaction of the conditions precedent set forth in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;3  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, the Participation Agreement shall be amended in accordance with
</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Sections 1.1-1.3  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.1 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Net Worth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;8.17 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>"SECTION
8.17 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Net Worth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Lessee shall not permit at any time Net Worth to be less than the sum of (a)&nbsp;$1,929,000,000, plus (b)&nbsp;50% of positive net income for the period from and
including May&nbsp;1, 2001, to and including October&nbsp;31, 2001, plus (c)&nbsp;for each fiscal year, commencing with the fiscal year ending October&nbsp;31, 2001, 50% of positive net income
for such fiscal year, plus (d)&nbsp;with respect to the issuance or sale of capital stock of Lessee or the conversion of Indebtedness of Lessee into equity of Lessee, in each case occurring after
the date hereof, 50% of the aggregate Net Issuance Proceeds received by Lessee from such issuance or sale of capital stock, plus 50% of the principal amount of any Indebtedness so converted if such
issuance, sale or conversion occurs at a time when Lessee shall have no Rating or at a time when Lessee's Rating is lower than BBB- and Baa3, respectively; such covenant to be calculated
as of the end of each fiscal quarter." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.2 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Funded Debt to EBITDA Ratio  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;8.18 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>"SECTION
8.18 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Funded Debt to EBITDA Ratio  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Lessee shall not permit, as of the end of any fiscal quarter, the ratio of (a)&nbsp;aggregate principal amount of Funded Debt of Lessee and its Subsidiaries to
(b)&nbsp;EBITDA for the four consecutive fiscal quarters then ending, to exceed 2.75:1." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.3 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Definitions  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. (a)&nbsp;Each of the following definitions appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"' </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Applicable Commitment Fee Rate  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>' means, at any time, the rate per annum of 37.5 basis points." </FONT></P>

</UL>
<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="9",CHK=105386,FOLIO='1',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KL1201A.;10',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_kl1201_1_2"> </A>
<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"'
</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Applicable Tranche A2 Margin  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>' means, at any time of determination of the LIBO Rate or the Alternate Base Rate for purposes of the Tranche A2 Certificate Amounts, the rate per annum of 225 basis
points." </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"' </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Applicable Tranche A3 Margin  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>' means, at any time of determination of the LIBO Rate or the Alternate Base Rate for purposes of the
Tranche A3 Certificate Amounts, the rate per annum of 235 basis points." </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"'
</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Applicable Tranche B Margin  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>' means, at any time of determination of the LIBO Rate or the Alternate Base Rate, the rate per annum of 250 basis points." </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"'
</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Applicable Tranche C Equity Margin  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>' means, at any time of determination of the LIBO Rate or the Alternate Base Rate, the rate per annum of 350 basis points." </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"' </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>EBITDA  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>' means, for any applicable period, Net Income for such period, plus, to the extent deducted in determining Net Income for such
period, the aggregate amount of
(i)&nbsp;Interest Expense, (ii)&nbsp;federal, state, local and foreign income taxes, (iii)&nbsp;depletion, depreciation and amortization of tangible and intangible assets and (iv)&nbsp;for the
quarter ended April&nbsp;30, 2001, $251,619,000 of non-recurring charges which accrued during such quarter." </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"' </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Interest Expense  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>' means, for any applicable period, the aggregate consolidated interest expense (both cash and non-cash and
determined without regard to original issue discount) of
Lessee and its Subsidiaries for such period </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>plus  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, without duplication, any interest expense which would have accrued during such period if all Indebtedness which existed immediately after the
consummation of any merger to
which Lessee is a party or of any Acquisition by Lessee or its Subsidiaries, in each case, during such period was in existence on the first day of such period, as determined in accordance with GAAP,
including, to the extent allocable to interest expense in accordance with GAAP, (i)&nbsp;all other fees paid or owed with respect to the issuance or maintenance of Contingent Obligations (including
letters of credit of Lessee and its Subsidiaries), (ii)&nbsp;net costs or benefits payable under Swap Contracts of Lessee and its Subsidiaries, (iii)&nbsp;the portion of any payments made in
respect of obligations in respect of capitalized leases of Lessee and its Subsidiaries allocable to interest expense and (iv)&nbsp;the portion of any rental payments made in respect of synthetic
leases under which Lessee or any Subsidiary is lessee allocable to interest." </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"'
</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Tranche A2 Put Margin  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>' means 250 basis points per annum." </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"'
</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Tranche A3 Put Margin  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>' means 260 basis points per annum." </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"' </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Tranche B Basic Rent  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>' means, for each Payment Date with respect to each Interest Period ending on such Payment Date, an amount equal
to the product of (a)&nbsp;the daily aggregate Certificate
Amounts of the Tranche B Participants, (b)&nbsp;the sum of the LIBO Rate (Reserve Adjusted) for such Interest Period (or pursuant to Section&nbsp;14.1 or 14.2 of the Participation Agreement, the
Alternate Base Rate) plus the Applicable Tranche B Margin, (c)&nbsp;1/360 and (d)&nbsp;the number of days in such Interest Period; </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>provided  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that if a Put Event has occurred, the foregoing </FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>clause&nbsp;(b)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> shall be deemed to be the sum of the LIBO Rate (Reserve Adjusted) for such Interest Period plus the Tranche B Put Margin as in effect from time to time; and </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>provided
further  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that immediately upon the occurrence of an Event of Default, the foregoing
</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>clause&nbsp;(b)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> shall be deemed to be the sum of the Alternate Base Rate in effect in such Interest Period plus 250 basis points per annum." </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"'
</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Tranche C Basic Rent  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>' means, for each Payment Date with respect to each Interest Period ending on such Payment Date, an
amount equal to the product of (a)&nbsp;the daily aggregate Certificate Amounts of the Tranche C Equity Participants, (b)&nbsp;the sum of the LIBO Rate (Reserve Adjusted) for such Interest Period
(or pursuant to Section&nbsp;14.1 or 14.2 of the Participation Agreement, the Alternate Base Rate) plus the Applicable Tranche C Equity Margin, (c)&nbsp;1/360 and </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>2</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=2,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="9",CHK=341074,FOLIO='2',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KL1201A.;10',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_kl1201_1_3"> </A>
<UL>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
(d)&nbsp;the number of days in such Interest Period; </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>provided  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that if a Put Event has occurred, the foregoing </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>clause&nbsp;(b)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> shall be deemed to be
the sum of the LIBO Rate (Reserve Adjusted) for such Interest Period plus the Tranche C Put Margin as in effect from time to time; and </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>provided further  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that immediately upon the occurrence of an
Event of Default, the foregoing </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>clause&nbsp;(b)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> shall be deemed to be the sum of the Alternate Base Rate in effect in such Interest Period plus 275 basis points per annum." </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;Appendix&nbsp;I
to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding thereto the following new terms in proper alphabetical order: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"'
</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Tranche B Put Margin  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>' means 275 basis points per annum." </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"'
</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Tranche C Put Margin  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>' means 375 basis points per annum." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
2 AMENDMENT FEE. Lessee agrees to pay to the Administrative Agent on the date hereof for the pro-rata benefit of the Participants an amendment fee (the "' </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Amendment Fee  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") in an amount equal to 0.25%
of the Commitments. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
3 CONDITIONS PRECEDENT. This Amendment shall become effective as of the date hereof upon the satisfaction or waiver of each of the following conditions precedent: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Agent Lessor shall have received this Amendment, duly executed by each of the parties hereto. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Administrative Agent shall have received, on behalf of the Participants, payment of the Amendment Fee. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;Each
of the Participants and the Agent Lessor shall have received copies (executed or certified, as may be appropriate) of all legal documents or proceedings taken in
connection with the execution and delivery of this Amendment to the extent each of the Participants or the Agent Lessor or their respective counsel may reasonably request. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;Legal
matters incident to the execution and delivery of this Amendment shall be satisfactory to each of the Participants and the Agent Lessor and their respective
counsel. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
4 REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES. Each of the parties hereto hereby represents and warrants that (a)&nbsp;the execution, delivery and performance of this Amendment has been
duly authorized by such party, (b)&nbsp;the person executing this Amendment on its behalf has been duly authorized to act on its behalf, (c)&nbsp;this Amendment constitutes its legal, valid,
binding and enforceable agreement, except as enforceability may be limited by bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium or other laws or equitable principles relating to or limiting the
rights of creditors generally and (d)&nbsp;its entry into this Amendment will not violate any agreement, law, rule or regulation by which it is bound or by which any of its assets are affected. In
order to induce the Participants and the Agent Lessor to execute and deliver this Amendment, Lessee hereby represents to each of the Participants and the Agent Lessor that, as of the date hereof, the
representations and warranties set forth in Section&nbsp;7.2 of the Participation Agreement are and shall be and remain true and correct and Lessee is in full compliance with all of the terms and
conditions of each Operative Document to which it is a party and no Default or Event of Default has occurred and is continuing or shall result after giving effect to this Amendment. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>3</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=3,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="9",CHK=666988,FOLIO='3',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KL1201A.;10',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_kl1201_1_4"> </A>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5 MISCELLANEOUS. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5.1 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Continuing Effectiveness, etc  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. This Amendment shall be deemed to be an amendment to the Participation Agreement, and the Participation Agreement, as amended hereby, and each other Operative
Document, shall
remain in full force and effect and are hereby ratified, approved and confirmed in each and every respect. On and after the date hereof, all references to the "Participation Agreement" in the
Operative Documents or in any other document, instrument, certificate, agreement, opinion or writing shall be deemed to refer to the Participation Agreement as amended hereby. Except as expressly set
forth herein, the execution, delivery and effectiveness of this Amendment shall not operate as an amendment, modification or waiver of any provision, right, power or remedy of any party hereto under
any Operative Document. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5.2 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Severability  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Any provision of this Amendment which is prohibited or unenforceable in any jurisdiction shall, as to such provision and such jurisdiction, be ineffective to the extent of
such prohibition or unenforceability without invalidating the remaining provisions of this Amendment or affecting the validity or enforceability of such provision in any other jurisdiction. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5.3 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Headings  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. The various headings of this Amendment are inserted for convenience of reference only and shall not affect the meaning or interpretation of this Amendment or any provisions
hereof. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5.4 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Execution in Counterparts  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. This Amendment may be executed by the parties hereto in several counterparts, each of which shall be deemed to be an original and all of which shall constitute together
but
one and the same agreement. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5.5 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Governing Law  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><B>THIS AMENDMENT SHALL IN ALL RESPECTS BE GOVERNED BY THE INTERNAL LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK AS TO ALL MATTERS OF CONSTRUCTION, VALIDITY AND PERFORMANCE,
WITHOUT REGARD TO
CONFLICTS OF LAW PRINCIPLES, EXCEPT TITLE 14 OF ARTICLE 5 OF THE NEW YORK GENERAL OBLIGATIONS LAW.  </B></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> This Amendment constitutes the entire understanding among the parties hereto with respect to the subject matter hereof and
supersedes any prior agreement, written or oral,
with respect thereto. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5.6 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Successors and Assigns  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. This Amendment shall be binding upon and shall inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and assigns. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5.7 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Fees and Expenses  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Lessee agrees to pay on demand all costs and expenses of or incurred by each of the other parties hereto in connection with the negotiation, preparation, execution and
delivery of this Amendment, including the fees and expenses of counsel for the Agent Lessor. </FONT></P>

pages follow] </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit 10-dd  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ko1201_third_amendment_to_participation_agreement_and_lease"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ko1201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B><I>THIRD AMENDMENT TO<BR>  PARTICIPATION AGREEMENT AND LEASE    <BR>  </I></B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS THIRD AMENDMENT TO PARTICIPATION AGREEMENT AND LEASE, dated as of October&nbsp;31, 2001 (this " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Amendment  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), amends (i)&nbsp;the
Participation Agreement, dated as of October&nbsp;22, 1999, by and among ADC Telecommunications,&nbsp;Inc., a Minnesota corporation (" </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>ADC  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" or " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Lessee  </I></FONT><FONT
SIZE=2>"), as Lessee; Lease Plan North America,&nbsp;Inc., not in its individual capacity, except as expressly stated therein, but solely as Agent Lessor for the Participants (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Agent Lessor  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>");
the Persons named on Schedule&nbsp;I thereto, as Participants; and ABN AMRO Bank N.V., as Administrative Agent, as amended by (A)&nbsp;the First Amendment to
Participation Agreement, dated as of January&nbsp;29, 2001 (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>First Amendment  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") and (B)&nbsp;the Second Amendment to Participation Agreement, dated as of August&nbsp;24, 2001 (the " </FONT> <FONT
SIZE=2><I>Second Amendment  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") (as so amended by the First Amendment and the Second Amendment, the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Participation Agreement  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") and (ii)&nbsp;the Lease, dated as of
October&nbsp;22, 1999 between ADC, as Lessee and Mortgagor, and the Agent Lessor, as Agent Lessor and Mortgagee (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Lease  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"). Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined herein shall
have the respective meanings assigned thereto in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the parties hereto have entered into the Participation Agreement, the Lease and the other Operative Documents to fund the Construction of the Financed Improvements on the Land;
and </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the parties hereto desire to amend the Participation Agreement and the Lease as hereinafter set forth; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW,
THEREFORE, in consideration of the premises and for other good and valuable consideration (the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged), the parties hereto agree as
follows: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1. AMENDMENTS. Effective as of the date hereof and subject to the satisfaction of the conditions precedent set forth in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;3  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, (a)&nbsp;the Participation Agreement shall be amended in
accordance with </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Sections 1.1  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> through </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>1.22  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> and (b)&nbsp;the Lease shall be amended in accordance with </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Sections 1.23
</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> through </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>1.25  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.1 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Advance Dates  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;3.1 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended to add the following at the end of the initial sentence of the final paragraph thereof: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"; </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>provided, however  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that there may be two Advance Dates during the month of October&nbsp;2001." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.2 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Certificates  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;3.7 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding the following sentence at the end thereof: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"Notwithstanding
the foregoing or anything else set forth in the Operative Documents regarding the Participants, the rights of the Tranche ADC Participant and ADC Certificate, and the
duties and obligations of Agent Lessor and Administrative Agent with respect thereto, shall be limited to those rights of the Tranche ADC Participant and ADC Certificate and the duties and obligations
of Agent Lessor and Administrative Agent as specifically set forth or referred to in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;8.21  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.3 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Amounts Due Under Lease  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Clause&nbsp;(iii) of Section&nbsp;5.2 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by replacing the reference to "Construction Recourse" thereof with the reference to
"Residual Guarantee". </FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="10",CHK=473293,FOLIO='1',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KO1201A.;12',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_ko1201_1_2"> </A>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.4 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Distribution  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Clause&nbsp;(iii) of Section&nbsp;5.3(b) of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"(iii)&nbsp;the
payment of the Lease Balance in accordance with Article&nbsp;XX of the Lease or the Base Term Commencement Date Rent Prepayment Amount pursuant to </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;8.21(a)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereof, or" </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.5 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Distribution  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Clause&nbsp;(iv) of Section&nbsp;5.3(b) of the Participation Agreement and the paragraphs following such clause&nbsp;(iv) are hereby amended and restated in their
entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"(iv)&nbsp;Lessee
failing to fulfill one or more of the conditions to the exercise of the Sale Option pursuant to Article&nbsp;XX of the Lease and the Administrative Agent's receipt
of the Lease Balance from Lessee pursuant to Article&nbsp;XX of the Lease, shall be distributed by the Administrative Agent in the following amounts and order of priority: </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>first  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche A Participants and Tranche B Participants for application to pay in full the Participant Balance (other than the
3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion) of each such
Participant, and in the case where the amount so distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among the Tranche A Participants and Tranche B Participants without
priority of one such Participant over the other in the proportion that each such Participant's Participant Balance bears to the sum of Tranche A Participant Balance and Tranche B Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>second  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche A Participants and Tranche B Participants for application to pay in full the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of each such Participant's Participant Balance, and in the
case where the amount so distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among such Participants without priority of one Participant over the other in the proportion that
each Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate sum of the Tranche A Participant Balance and the Tranche B Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>third  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, so long as an Insolvency Event has not occurred, to the Tranche ADC Participant for application to pay in full the Tranche ADC Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>fourth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche C Equity Participants for application to pay in full the Tranche C Participant Balance (other than the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion) of each Tranche C Equity
Participant, and in the case where the amount so distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among the Tranche C Equity Participants without priority of one Tranche C
Equity Participant over the other in the proportion that each Tranche C Equity Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche C Equity Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>fifth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche C Equity Participants to pay in full the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of each such Tranche C Equity Participant's Participant Balance; and in the case where the
amount so distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among the Tranche C Equity Participants without priority of one Tranche C Equity Participant over the other in
the proportion that each such Tranche C Equity Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche C Participant Balance such Participant; and </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>sixth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, if an Insolvency Event has occurred, to the Tranche ADC Participant for application to pay in full the Tranche ADC Participant Balance." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.6 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Distribution  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;5.3(c) of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"(c)
The payment by Lessee of the Residual Value Guarantee Amount to the Administrative Agent in accordance with Article&nbsp;XX of the Lease upon Lessee's exercise of the Sale Option
shall be distributed by the Administrative Agent as promptly as possible (it being understood that any </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>2</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=2,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="10",CHK=2875,FOLIO='2',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KO1201A.;12',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_ko1201_1_3"> </A>
<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
such payment received by the Administrative Agent on a timely basis in accordance with the provisions of the Lease shall be distributed on the date on which such funds are so received) in the
following order of priority: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><I>first  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche A Participants for application to pay in full the Participant Balance of each Tranche A Participant; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>second  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche B Participants for application to pay in full the Participant Balance of each Tranche B Participant, and in the case where the amounts so distributed shall be
insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among the Tranche B Participants without priority of one Tranche B Participant over the other in the proportion that each such Tranche B
Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche B Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>third  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche ADC Participant for application to pay in full the Tranche ADC Participant Balance; and </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>fourth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche C Equity Participants for application to pay in full the Participant Balance of each Tranche C Equity Participant, and in the case where the amounts so
distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among the Tranche C Equity Participants without priority of one Tranche C Equity Participant over the other in the
proportion that each such Tranche C Equity Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche C Equity Participant Balance." </FONT></P>

</UL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.7 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Distribution  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;5.3(d) of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"(d)
Any payments received by the Administrative Agent as net proceeds from the sale of the Premises following the occurrence of an Event of Default under Article&nbsp;XVI of the
Lease, following the occurrence of a Construction Agency Event of Default or pursuant to Lessee's exercise of the Sale Option pursuant to Article&nbsp;XIX of the Lease, together with any payment
made by Lessee as a result of an appraisal pursuant to </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;12.3  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereof, shall be distributed by the Administrative Agent as promptly as possible (it being understood that any such payment
received by the Administrative Agent on a timely
basis and in accordance with
the provisions of the Lease shall be distributed on the date received) in the funds so received in the following order of priority: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><I>first  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, on a pro rata basis based on their respective shares of the sum of the Tranche A1 Participant Balance (other than the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion) and Tranche A2 Participant
Balance (other than the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion), to the Tranche A1 Participants and Tranche A2 Participants for application to pay in full the sum of the Tranche A1 Participant Balance and Tranche A2
Participant Balance, and then on a pro rata basis based on their respective shares of the Tranche A3 Participant Balance (other than the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion), to the Tranche A3 Participants to pay
in full the Tranche A3 Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>second  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche B Participants for application to pay in full the Participant Balance (other than the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion) of each Tranche B Participant, and in the case
where the amount so distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among the Tranche B Participants without priority of one Tranche B Participant over the other in the
proportion that each Tranche B Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche B Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>third  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, so long as an Insolvency Event has not occurred, to the Tranche ADC Participant for application to pay in full the Tranche ADC Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>fourth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche C Equity Participants for application to pay in full the Participant Balance (other than the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion) of each Tranche C Equity Participant, and
in the case </FONT></P>

</UL>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>3</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=3,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="10",CHK=835184,FOLIO='3',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KO1201A.;12',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_ko1201_1_4"> </A>
<UL>
<UL>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
where the amount so distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among the Tranche C Equity Participants without priority of one Tranche C Equity Participant over the
other in the proportion that each Tranche C Equity Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche C Equity Participant Balance; </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>fifth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, if an Insolvency Event has occurred, to the Tranche ADC Participant for application to pay in full the Tranche ADC Participant
Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>sixth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, an amount up to, but not exceeding, the Residual Value Guarantee Amount, if any, paid by Lessee reduced by any amounts paid to the Tranche ADC Participant pursuant to clauses </FONT> <FONT
SIZE=2><I>third  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> or </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>fifth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> above, shall be promptly distributed to, or as directed by, Lessee; </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>seventh  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, on a pro rata basis based on their respective shares of the sum of the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of the Tranche A1 Participant
Balance and Tranche A2 Participant Balance, to the
Tranche A1 Participants and Tranche A2 Participants for application to pay in full the sum of the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of the Tranche A1 Participant Balance and Tranche A2 Participant Balance, and
then on a pro rata basis based on their respective shares of the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of the Tranche A3 Participant Balance to the Tranche A3 Participants to pay in full the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion
of the Tranche A3 Participant Balance; </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>eighth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche B Participants to pay in full the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of their Participant Balances until their Participant
Balances have been paid in full; and in any case
where the amount shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among such Participants without priority of one Tranche B Participant over the other in the proportion that each
Tranche B Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche B Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>ninth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche C Equity Participants to pay in full the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of their Participant Balances until their Participant Balances have been paid in full; and in
any case where the amount shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among such Participants without priority of one Tranche C Equity Participant over the other in the proportion
that each Tranche C Equity Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche C Equity Participant Balance; and </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>tenth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, the balance, if any, shall be promptly distributed to, or as directed by, Lessee." </FONT></P>

</UL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.8 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Distribution  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Subclause (ii)&nbsp;of clause third of Section&nbsp;5.3(f) of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding immediately after the reference to " </FONT> <FONT
SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.3(c)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" therein the following: "(but excluding clause
</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>third  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> from the application thereof)". </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.9 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Distribution  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;5.3 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding thereto immediately following clause&nbsp;(f) thereof the following new clause&nbsp;(g): </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"(g)
If an Event of Default shall have occurred and be continuing, then any cash held by Agent Lessor and all cash proceeds received by Agent Lessor in respect of any sale of, collection
from, or other realization upon, all or any part of the Pledged Collateral shall be distributed by Agent Lessor as promptly as possible in the following order of priority: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><I>first  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the payment of any reasonable costs or expenses related to the retaking, holding, preparing for sale and selling the Pledged Collateral and reasonable attorney's fees and
legal expenses incurred by Agent Lessor in respect thereof payable to Agent Lessor pursuant to this Participation Agreement, the Lease and any other Operative Document; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>second  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, in an amount not to exceed the aggregate Maximum Amount, to the Tranche A1 Participants and Tranche A2 Participants, on a pro rata basis based on their respective shares of
the aggregate amount of the Tranche A1 Obligations and Tranche A2 Obligations then </FONT></P>

</UL>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>4</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=4,SEQ=4,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="10",CHK=52926,FOLIO='4',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KO1201A.;12',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_ko1201_1_5"> </A>
<UL>
<UL>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
outstanding, to pay in full the Tranche A1 Obligations and Tranche A2 Obligations then due and owing to the Tranche A1 Participants and Tranche A2 Participants, and then, on a pro rata basis based on
their respective shares of the Tranche A3 Obligations, to the Tranche A3 Participants to pay in full the Tranche A3 Obligations then due and owing to the Tranche A3 Participants; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>third  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, in an amount which, together with all amounts paid under </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>clause second  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> does not exceed the Maximum Amount to the Tranche B Participants, on a pro rata
basis based on their respective shares of the aggregate amount of the Tranche B Obligations
then outstanding, to pay in full the Tranche B Obligations then due and owing to the Tranche B Participants; </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>fourth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, in an amount which, together with all amounts paid under </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>clauses second  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> and
</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>third  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, does not exceed the Maximum Amount, to the Tranche C Equity Participants on a pro rata basis based on their respective shares of the aggregate amount of the Tranche C Equity
Obligations then outstanding, to pay in full the Tranche C Equity Obligations then due and owing to the Tranche C Equity Participants; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>fifth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the payment of all other reasonable costs and expenses payable to Agent Lessor pursuant to this Participation Agreement, the Lease and any other Operative Document; and </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>sixth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, the balance, if any, shall be promptly distributed to, or as directed by, Lessee." </FONT></P>

</UL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.10 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Distribution  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;5.4 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding a new Section&nbsp;5.4(c), which shall read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"(c)
Any payment of the Tranche ADC Purchase Price shall be distributed forthwith by the Administrative Agent to the Selling Tranche A Participants, it being understood that if the
Selling Tranche A Participants are the Committed Tranche A Participants, then such amounts shall be distributed among the Selling Tranche A Participants on a pro rata basis based on their respective
shares of the Tranche A2 Participant Balances and Tranche A3 Participant Balances." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.11 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Application of Amounts  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. The Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding immediately after Section&nbsp;5.4 thereof the following new Section&nbsp;5.5: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"SECTION
5.5 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Application of Amounts  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Notwithstanding the actual date that Administrative Agent receives any proceeds from the sale of any Collateral or Pledged Collateral or of the timing of any distributions
by
Administrative Agent following an Event of Default pursuant to </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.3  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, the parties hereby agree and acknowledge that it is their intent that the proceeds realized from the sale, collection
or realization of the Pledged Collateral shall be deemed
applied in the reduction of the Lease Balance and the applicable Participant Balances as provided at </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.3(g)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> prior to the reduction of the Lease Balance or any Participant Balance as a
result of the application of any payments or amounts realized by Administrative Agent of the type
described in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.3(d)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> or </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.3(f)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>." </FONT></P>

</UL>

Tranche ADC Participant)". </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.14 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Enhancer Collateral  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. The Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding immediately after Section&nbsp;8.19 thereof the following new Section&nbsp;8.20: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"SECTION
8.20 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Enhancer Collateral  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT>
<FONT SIZE=2><I>Pledge of Enhancer Collateral  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. In order to secure the payment and performance of the Secured Amounts (pursuant to and in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Pledge Agreement and the Custody
Agreement) Lessee shall, on or before the Third Amendment Effective Date, deliver Treasury Securities to the Custodian to be held by the Custodian in an account (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Enhancer Collateral Account  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>")
pursuant to the Custody Agreement, and which Treasury Securities shall have an aggregate Enhancer Collateral Value on the Third Amendment Effective Date (which Enhancer
Collateral Value, except in the case of any cash, shall be determined on and as of the Third Amendment Effective Date in accordance with the proviso in the definition of "Market Value") equal to or
greater than the Enhancer Collateral Requirement. Except as provided for in the last sentence of </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;8.21(a)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, the Lessee agrees to maintain in the Enhancer Collateral Account with the
Custodian during the Term, pursuant to the Custody Agreement and subject to the Pledge Agreement,
Enhancer Collateral having an aggregate Enhancer Collateral Value at all times equal to or greater than the Enhancer Collateral Requirement. Without limiting the foregoing and subject to the terms and
conditions of the Custody Agreement and the Pledge Agreement, so long as no Default or Event of Default has occurred and is continuing, (i)&nbsp;Lessee shall have the right from time to time at its
sole expense to
substitute for all or any of the Enhancer Collateral then subject to a security interest in favor of Agent Lessor pursuant to the Pledge Agreement and the Custody Agreement, different types of
Enhancer Collateral or Enhancer Collateral of the same type which has different dates, maturities, amounts, interest rates or other characteristics; </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>provided, however  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, all such substitute Enhancer
Collateral shall be of the type described and otherwise comply with the requirements set forth in the definition of "Enhancer Collateral"; and </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>provided, further
</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that the Agent Lessor shall maintain a first priority security interest in the substitute Enhancer Collateral as provided for below, and (ii)&nbsp;to the extent (and only
to the extent) that the aggregate Enhancer Collateral Value of the Enhancer Collateral subject to the Pledge Agreement and the Custody Agreement at any time is in excess of the Enhancer Collateral
Requirement, Lessee shall have the right at its sole expense to instruct the Custodian to deliver Enhancer Collateral having an aggregate Enhancer Collateral Value up to the amount of such excess to
Lessee or its designee, whereupon the Enhancer Collateral so delivered to Lessee or such designee will no longer be subject to the Pledge Agreement and the Custody Agreement. Agent Lessor shall at all
times have a first priority security interest in the Enhancer Collateral, including all such substituted Enhancer Collateral, for the benefit of the Secured Parties, free and clear of all other Liens.
Neither of the Agents nor any Participant shall bear any liability for any losses on or in respect of any of the Enhancer Collateral, except as the result of acts of gross negligence or willful
misconduct on the part of such party. All income from or in respect of the Enhancer Collateral shall be taxable to Lessee. Except as expressly provided herein, Lessee shall have no right to withdraw
any of the Enhancer Collateral from the Enhancer Collateral Account. Lessee may not direct either Agent or any Participant to apply any of the Enhancer Collateral to any Obligation, including, without
limitation, the obligation of Lessee to pay any amounts due under the Operative Documents. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Enhancer Collateral Valuation  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Lessee shall deliver to Administrative Agent (x)&nbsp;on the Third Amendment Effective
Date and (y)&nbsp;thereafter, by no later than the twenty-first
(21<SUP>st</SUP>) day of each calendar month (or if such twenty-first (21<SUP>st</SUP>) day is not a Business Day, then the Business Day immediately succeeding such twenty-first (21st day) (each
such day, an " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Enhancer Collateral Valuation Date  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") an Enhancer Collateral Valuation Notice (a copy of </FONT></P>

</UL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.15 The Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding immediately after Section&nbsp;8.20 thereof the following new Section&nbsp;8.21: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"SECTION
8.21 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Rent Prepayment; ADC Certificate  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;Upon
Substantial Completion, Lessee shall, on the Base Term Commencement Date, either (i)&nbsp;purchase from the Tranche A1 Participant or, if any amounts have been
funded by the Committed Tranche A Participants, proportionately from the Committed Tranche A Participants (such Tranche A1 Participant or Committed Tranche A Participant, the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Selling Tranche A Participants  </I></FONT><FONT
SIZE=2>") Certificate Amounts equal to the Adjusted Additional Commitment Amount (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Tranche ADC Purchase Price  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") or (ii)&nbsp;pay to Lessor the Base Term Commencement Date Rent Prepayment Amount.
The Tranche ADC Purchase Price or Base Term Commencement Date Rent Prepayment Amount, as
applicable, shall be paid by Lessee to the Administrative Agent in immediately available funds on the Base Term Commencement Date. Any such payment shall be accompanied by a written notice from Lessee
as to whether such payment constitutes the Tranche ADC Purchase Price or the Base Term Commencement Date Rent Prepayment Amount. If Lessee fails to give such notice with such payment, such payment
shall be deemed a payment of the Base Term Commencement Date Rent Prepayment Amount. Any such payment shall be distributed pursuant to </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.3(b)(iii)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;or </FONT> <FONT
SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.4(c)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, as applicable. Upon receipt by Administrative Agent of the Tranche ADC Purchase Price or Base Term Commencement Date Rent Prepayment Amount, as applicable, provided no Event
of Default then exists and after payment by Lessee of any costs or expenses then due and payable to any Person with respect to the Enhancer Collateral Account or the Pledged Collateral pursuant to the
terms of the Pledge and Security Agreement, the Participants shall instruct the Administrative Agent to cause the release to Lessee of the Pledged Collateral then on deposit in the Enhancer Collateral
Account. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;Should
Lessee elect to purchase the Certificate Amounts set forth in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;8.21(a)(i)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;above, then upon the payment of the Tranche ADC Purchase Price, (i)&nbsp;the Certificate Amounts purchased by
Lessee from the Selling Tranche A Participants pursuant
to this </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;8.21(a)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>shall be converted, automatically and without further action, to the Tranche ADC Participant Balance, (ii)&nbsp;Agent Lessor and Lessee shall cause to be delivered to
Lessee,
in its capacity as the Tranche ADC Participant, the ADC Certificate substantially in the form of Exhibit&nbsp;N attached hereto in the face amount equal to the Tranche ADC Purchase Price,
(iii)&nbsp;each Selling Tranche A Participant shall deliver its Certificate to Agent Lessor in exchange for a new Certificate of the same tranche and in the face amount equal to the face amount of
the Certificate delivered by such Selling Tranche A Participant reduced by the portion of the Tranche ADC Purchase Price paid to such Selling Tranche A Participant, and (iv)&nbsp;Administrative
Agent shall modify </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Schedule&nbsp;I  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> to reflect such purchase by reducing the Commitment of each Tranche A Participant, Tranche B Participant and Tranche C Equity Participant by an amount equal to the
</FONT></P>

any Basic Rent, all of which shall be paid to the other Participants in accordance
with the Operative Documents, and all payments to be made with respect to the ADC Certificate shall be subject to the order of priority set forth in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.3  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;Except
as expressly provided in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.3  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, all payments with respect to the ADC Certificate and the Tranche ADC Participant Balance (all such obligations, the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Tranche ADC
Liabilities  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") shall be postponed and subordinated to the payment in full of all Senior Liabilities, and no payments or other distributions whatsoever in respect of any Tranche ADC
Liabilities shall be made, nor shall the Premises, the Collateral or any other property subject to the Operative Documents be applied to the purchase or other acquisition or retirement of any Tranche
ADC Liabilities. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;In
the event of any Insolvency Event relating to Lessee (including in its capacity as the Tranche ADC Participant) or any guarantor, or affecting its property (whether
voluntary or involuntary, partial or complete, and whether in bankruptcy, insolvency or receivership, or upon an assignment for the benefit of creditors, or any other marshalling of the assets and
liabilities of Lessee (including in its capacity as Tranche ADC Participant) or any guarantor, or any sale of all or substantially all of the assets of Lessee or any guarantor, or otherwise, the
Senior Liabilities, including all amounts accruing under the Operative Documents, whether for interest, fees and costs, or otherwise, on or after the occurrence of such event, and notwithstanding
that, by operation of Sections 502(b) and 506 of the Bankruptcy Code or other law governing such proceeding, such amounts may not constitute enforceable claims against or be payable during or after
such proceeding by the entity that is the subject of such proceeding, shall first be paid in full before the Tranche ADC Participant shall be entitled to receive and to retain any payment or
distribution in respect of the Tranche ADC Liabilities and, in order to implement the foregoing: (i)&nbsp;all payments and distributions of any kind or character in respect of the Tranche ADC
Liabilities to which the Tranche ADC Participant would be entitled if the Tranche ADC Liabilities were not subordinated, or subordinated and pledged or assigned pursuant to this Participation
Agreement, shall be made directly to the Administrative Agent; (ii)&nbsp;to the extent permitted by Applicable Laws, the Tranche ADC Participant shall promptly file&nbsp;a claim or claims, in the
form required in such proceedings, for the full outstanding amount of the Tranche ADC Liabilities, and shall cause said claim or claims to be approved and all payments and other distributions in
respect thereof to be made directly to the Administrative Agent; and (iii)&nbsp;the Tranche ADC Participant hereby irrevocably agrees that the Administrative Agent may, at its sole discretion, in
the name of the undersigned or otherwise, demand, sue for, collect, receive and receipt for any and all such payments or distributions, and file, prove and vote or consent in any such proceedings with
respect to any and all claims of the Tranche ADC Participant relating to the Tranche ADC Liabilities for the benefit of the Senior Liabilities. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;In
the event that the Tranche ADC Participant receives any payment or other distribution of any kind or character from the Agent Lessor, Lessee or any guarantor, or from
any other source whatsoever, in respect of any of the Tranche ADC Liabilities, other than as expressly permitted by the terms of </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.3  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, such payment or other distribution shall be received
in trust for the Administrative Agent and promptly turned over by the Tranche ADC Participant to the Administrative Agent
for the benefit of the Senior Liabilities. The Tranche ADC Participant will mark its books and records so as clearly to indicate that the Tranche ADC Liabilities are subordinated in accordance with
the terms of this </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;8.21  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, and will cause to be clearly inserted in any certificate, promissory note or other instrument which at any time evidences any of the Tranche ADC Liabilities a
statement to
the effect that the payment thereof is subordinated in accordance with the terms of this Participation Agreement. The undersigned will execute such </FONT></P>

</UL>

payments and distributions received by the Administrative Agent in respect of the Tranche ADC Liabilities, to the extent received in or converted into cash, may be

and,
wherever in the Operative Documents the consent or approval of the Participants or the Required Participants is required, the Tranche ADC Participant shall have no right to so consent or approve." </FONT></P>

Line: (952)&nbsp;917-0800<BR>
Fax No.: (952)&nbsp;917-0638". </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
form of ADC Certificate shall be attached to the Participation Agreement as Exhibit&nbsp;N. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.22 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Definitions  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "Aggregate Commitment Amount" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as
follows: " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Aggregate Commitment Amount  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" means One Hundred Thirty-Seven Million Dollars ($137,000,000). </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "Certificate Amount" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows: " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Certificate Amount  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" means as of any
date of determination, (i)&nbsp;with respect to any Participant, other than the Tranche ADC Participant, the aggregate amount of Fundings by such
Participant on all Advance Dates pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.1 of the Participation Agreement, plus (or, in the case of the Tranche A1 </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>10</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=10,SEQ=10,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="10",CHK=289450,FOLIO='10',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KO1201B.;5',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
Participant, minus) the aggregate of the Transfer Prices paid by such Participant under the Transfer Agreement, plus the aggregate amount funded by such Participant pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.1 of
the Transfer Agreement, minus the aggregate purchase price received by such Participant pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.2 of the Transfer Agreement (or, in the case of the Tranche A1 Participant, plus
the purchase price paid by the Tranche A1 Participant pursuant to Section&nbsp;2.4 of the Transfer Agreement) or (ii)&nbsp;with respect to the Tranche ADC Participant, the Tranche ADC Purchase
Price, and in the case of both items (i)&nbsp;and (ii)&nbsp;net of any distributions that constitute reductions to the face amount of such Participant's Certificate made to such Participant
pursuant to Section&nbsp;5.3 of the Participation Agreement with respect thereto. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "Construction Costs" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows: " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Construction Costs  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" means the
amounts (including Capitalized Interest and Capitalized Yield, Fees and insurance premiums during the Construction Period) required to acquire or construct the
Financed Improvements (including Soft Costs) and to pay Transaction Expenses in accordance with the Approved Plans and Specifications and the Operative Documents. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "Financed Improvements" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as
follows: " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Financed Improvements  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" means all buildings, fixtures and equipment of every kind existing at any time and from time to time constructed pursuant to the Construction Agency Agreement or
purchased
with amounts advanced by the Participants pursuant to the Participation Agreement on or under the Land, together with any and all appurtenances to such buildings or improvements, including sidewalks,
utility pipes, conduits and lines, parking areas and roadways, including the Furniture and Equipment. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "Outside Completion Date" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as
follows: " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Outside Completion Date  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" means December&nbsp;18, 2001. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "Participants" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as follows: " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Participants  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" means, collectively, the
Tranche A1 Participant, the Tranche A2 Participants, Tranche A3 Participant, the Tranche B Participants, the Tranche C Equity Participants and,
solely for the specific purposes set forth in the Operative Documents, the Tranche ADC Participant. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "Required Participants" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read as
follows: " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Required Participants  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" means, as of the date of the determination, holders of Certificates (but excluding the ADC Certificate) representing more than two-thirds of the then outstanding
Lease Balance (excluding the Tranche ADC Participant Balance). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(h)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "Residual Value Guarantee Amount" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety to read
as follows: " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Residual Value Guarantee Amount  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" means an amount equal to 88.00% of the aggregate Advances Funded by the Participants less any Loan to Value Optional Prepayments or Base Term
Commencement Date Rent
Prepayment Amount made, but in no event less than the aggregate outstanding Certificate Amounts of the Tranche A
Participants on the Expiration Date provided however, that (i)&nbsp;if a Construction Agency Event of Default has occurred and Lessee has paid Prepaid Rent, or (ii)&nbsp;if any amount has been
capitalized pursuant to clause&nbsp;(ii) of Section3.5 of the Participation Agreement, then the Residual Value Guarantee Amount shall be recomputed such that (a)&nbsp;Lessee is not deemed under
GAAP to be the owner of the Premises prior to Completion, and (b)&nbsp;from Lessee's perspective the Lease qualifies as an operating lease in accordance with GAAP in effect on the date of the
Participation Agreement. </FONT></P>

Valuation Date, no Enhancer Collateral Valuation Notice has been received by Agent Lessor in respect of such Enhancer Collateral

Collateral Valuation Date (if any) immediately preceding such date, the "Market Value" of such Enhancer Collateral on such Enhancer Collateral Valuation Date or such other date, as the case may be,
shall be the closing price for such Enhancer Collateral on the Business Day immediately preceding such Enhancer Collateral Valuation Date or such other date, as the case may be, as reported in such
generally recognized third party pricing source selected in good faith by Agent Lessor (plus, in the case of the determination of "Market Value" pursuant to this proviso, accrued and unpaid interest
and principal to the extent not included therein). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
2. AMENDMENT FEE. Lessee agrees to pay to the Administrative Agent on the date hereof for the pro-rata benefit of the Participants an amendment fee (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Amendment Fee  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") in an amount equal to
$150,000. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
3. CONDITIONS PRECEDENT. This Amendment shall become effective as of the date hereof upon the satisfaction of each of the following conditions precedent: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Agent Lessor shall have received this Amendment, the Pledge Agreement and the Custody Agreement, each duly executed by each of the parties thereto. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Administrative Agent shall have received, on behalf of the Participants, payment of the Amendment Fee. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;Each
of the Participants and the Agent Lessor shall have received copies (executed or certified, as may be appropriate) of all legal documents or proceedings taken in
connection with the execution and delivery of (i)&nbsp;this Amendment, (ii)&nbsp;the Pledge Agreement, (iii)&nbsp;the Custody Agreement and (iv)&nbsp;each other document, instrument and UCC
financing statement executed and delivered in connection herewith or therewith (the items in clauses (i), (ii)&nbsp;and (iii), collectively, the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Third Amendment Documents  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") to the extent each of the
Participants or the Agent Lessor or their respective counsel may reasonably request. </FONT></P>

<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=14,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="10",CHK=650540,FOLIO='14',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KP1201A.;5',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;Legal
