respective counsel. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Participants shall have obtained an appraisal in form and substance satisfactory to each of the Participants which shall establish (by the use of appraisal methods
satisfactory to the Participants) that the "as-built" Fair Market Value of the Financed Improvements (assuming the Substantial Completion of the Financed Improvements in accordance with
the Approved Plans and Specifications and for the amounts set forth in the Approved Construction Budget delivered by the Lessee pursuant to clause&nbsp;(i) of this </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;3  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>) as of the Estimated
Completion Date and as of the last day of the Base Term and each Lease Renewal Term is equal to at least $137,000,000 (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Appraisal  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"). The Appraisal shall assume that all of the Financed
Improvements shall have been completed in a good and workmanlike manner, in compliance with Applicable Laws.
 </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Agent
Lessor shall have received from the Title Insurance Company either a new or revised Owner's Policy and Lenders' Policy, in each case (i)&nbsp;reflecting an
amount equal to $137,000,000, (ii)&nbsp;except in the case of </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>clause&nbsp;(i)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, meeting the requirements of Section&nbsp;6.1(o) of the Participation Agreement and (iii)&nbsp;otherwise acceptable in
form and substance to Agent Lessor. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee
shall have provided to Agent Lessor evidence satisfactory to Agent Lessor that Lessee is in compliance with its obligations under Section&nbsp;13.1(d) of the
Lease. For purposes of this </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>clause&nbsp;(g)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, Aggregate Commitment Amount, as such term is used in Section&nbsp;13.1(d) of the Lease, shall have the meaning set forth in </FONT> <FONT
SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;1.22(a)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> of this Amendment. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(h)&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee
shall have delivered Treasury Securities to the Custodian pursuant to and in accordance with the requirements of Section&nbsp;8.20 of the Participation
Agreement (as amended hereby). </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Not
less than ten Business Days prior to the first Advance Date immediately following the date hereof, Lessee shall have delivered to Agent Lessor and each Participant a
revised Approved Construction Budget, which shall be in form and substance satisfactory to the Participants. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(j)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Agent
Lessor shall have received (i)&nbsp;the Amendment to Memorandum of Lease, Mortgage and Security Agreement dated as of the date hereof (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Modification  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), duly executed by each of the parties
thereto and amendments to the financing statements to reflect the Furniture and Equipment, and (ii)&nbsp;evidence of the recording of
the Modification in the office of the Registrar of Titles for Hennepin County, Minnesota and the filing of the amended financing statements in the office of the Registrar of Titles for Hennepin
County, Minnesota and in the office of the Secretary of State of Minnesota. Lessee hereby approves the form of each amendment to the financing statements and authorizes Agent Lessor to file such
amendments with the appropriate filing offices. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(k)&nbsp;&nbsp;Each
Participant shall have received a new original Certificate, evidencing the amendments set forth in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Sections 1.8  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> and </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>1.10  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereof, duly executed by
Lessee, authenticated by Agent Lessor and registered in such Participant's name. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(l)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee
shall have delivered to Agent Lessor (i)&nbsp;opinions of Dorsey&nbsp;&amp; Whitney LLP, special counsel to Lessee, and Jeffrey D. Pflaum, general counsel of
Lessee, as to matters set forth in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Exhibit&nbsp;A  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>hereto, and (ii)&nbsp;an opinion of Dorsey&nbsp;&amp; Whitney LLP, special counsel to Lessee, addressing perfection, lien and security interest matters
in respect of the
Pledged Collateral (which opinion may be included in the opinion of Dorsey&nbsp;&amp; Whitney LLP described in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>clause&nbsp;(i)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>), each of which opinions shall be reasonably acceptable in form and
substance to the Participants. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
4. REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES. Each of the parties hereto hereby represents and warrants that (a)&nbsp;the execution, delivery and performance of each Third Amendment </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>15</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=2,SEQ=15,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="10",CHK=139105,FOLIO='15',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KP1201A.;5',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_kp1201_1_16"> </A>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
Document to which it is a party has been duly authorized by such party, (b)&nbsp;the person executing each Third Amendment Document to which it is a party on its behalf has been duly authorized to
act on its behalf, (c)&nbsp;each Third Amendment Document to which it is a party constitutes its legal, valid, binding and enforceable agreement, except as enforceability may be limited by
bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium or other laws or equitable principles relating to or limiting the rights of creditors generally, and (d)&nbsp;its entry into each Third Amendment
Document to which it is a party will not violate any agreement, law, rule or regulation by which it is bound or by which any of its assets are affected. In order to induce the Participants and the
Agent Lessor to execute and deliver each Third Amendment Document to which it is a party, Lessee hereby represents to each of the Participants and the Agent Lessor that, as of the date hereof,
(i)&nbsp;the representations and warranties set forth in Section&nbsp;7.2 of the Participation Agreement are and shall be and remain true and correct, (ii)&nbsp;Lessee is in full compliance with
all of the terms and conditions of each Operative Document and Third Amendment Document to which it is a party, (iii)&nbsp;no Default or Event of Default has occurred and is continuing or shall
result after giving effect to each Third Amendment Document and (iv)&nbsp;the Agent Lessor (for the benefit of the Secured Parties) has a valid and enforceable first priority Lien on and security
interest in the Pledged Collateral (as defined in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;1.22(n)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereof) free and clear of all other Liens. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5. MISCELLANEOUS. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5.1 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Continuing Effectiveness, etc  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. This Amendment shall be deemed to be an amendment to the Participation Agreement and the Lease, and the Participation Agreement and the Lease, as amended hereby, and
each
other Operative Document, shall remain in full force and effect and are hereby ratified, approved and confirmed in each and every respect. On and after the date hereof, all references to the
"Participation Agreement" and the "Lease" in the Operative Documents or in any other document, instrument, certificate, agreement, opinion or writing shall be deemed to refer to the Participation
Agreement and the Lease, as the case may be, as amended hereby. Except as expressly set forth herein, the execution, delivery and effectiveness of this Amendment shall not operate as an amendment,
modification or waiver of any provision of, or any right, power or remedy of any party hereto under, any Operative Document. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5.2 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Severability  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Any provision of this Amendment which is prohibited or unenforceable in any jurisdiction shall, as to such provision and such jurisdiction, be ineffective to the extent of
such prohibition or unenforceability
without invalidating the remaining provisions of this Amendment or affecting the validity or enforceability of such provision in any other jurisdiction. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5.3 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Headings  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. The various headings of this Amendment are inserted for convenience of reference only and shall not affect the meaning or interpretation of this Amendment or any provisions
hereof. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5.4 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Execution in Counterparts  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. This Amendment may be executed by the parties hereto in several counterparts, each of which shall be deemed to be an original and all of which shall constitute together
but
one and the same agreement. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5.5 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Governing Law  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. THIS AMENDMENT SHALL IN ALL RESPECTS BE GOVERNED BY THE INTERNAL LAW OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK AS TO ALL MATTERS OF CONSTRUCTION, VALIDITY AND PERFORMANCE, WITHOUT REGARD TO
CONFLICTS OF LAW PRINCIPLES, EXCEPT TITLE 14 OF ARTICLE 5 OF THE NEW YORK GENERAL OBLIGATIONS LAW. This Amendment constitutes the entire understanding among the parties hereto with respect to the
subject matter hereof and supersedes any prior agreement, written or oral, with respect thereto. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5.6 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Successors and Assigns  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. This Amendment shall be binding upon and shall inure to the benefit of the parties hereto and their respective successors and permitted assigns. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>16</FONT></P>

<A NAME="page_kp1201_1_17"> </A>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
5.7 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Fees and Expenses  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Lessee agrees to pay on demand all costs and expenses of or incurred by each of the other parties hereto in connection with the negotiation, preparation, execution and
delivery of each Third Amendment Document, including the fees and expenses of counsel for the Agent Lessor, as well as all recording and filing fees and taxes with respect to the filings and
recordings made pursuant to </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;3(j)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereof. </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="RIGHT"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit 10-ee  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="ks1201_fourth_amendment_to_participation_agreement"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_ks1201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>FOURTH AMENDMENT TO<BR>  PARTICIPATION AGREEMENT    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS FOURTH AMENDMENT TO PARTICIPATION AGREEMENT, dated as of December&nbsp;11, 2001 (this "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Amendment</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), amends
the Participation Agreement, dated as of October&nbsp;22, 1999, by and among ADC Telecommunications,&nbsp;Inc., a Minnesota corporation ("</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>ADC</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" or
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Lessee</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), as Lessee; Lease Plan North America,&nbsp;Inc., not in its individual capacity, except as expressly stated therein, but solely as Agent
Lessor for the Participants (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Agent Lessor</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"); the Persons named on Schedule&nbsp;I thereto, as Participants; and ABN AMRO Bank N.V., as
Administrative Agent, as amended by (A)&nbsp;the First Amendment to Participation Agreement, dated as of January&nbsp;29, 2001 (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>First
Amendment</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), (B)&nbsp;the Second Amendment to Participation Agreement, dated as of August&nbsp;24, 2001 (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Second
Amendment</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") and (C)&nbsp;the Third Amendment to the Participation Agreement and Lease, dated as of October&nbsp;31, 2001 (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Third
Amendment</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") (as so amended by the First Amendment, the Second Amendment and the Third Amendment, the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Participation Agreement</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>").
Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined herein shall have the respective meanings assigned thereto in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the parties hereto have entered into the Participation Agreement and the other Operative Documents to fund the Construction of the Financed Improvements on the Land; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the Put Event has occurred pursuant to the Transfer Agreement and the Tranche A1 Participant has sold all of its interests to the Purchasers; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the parties hereto acknowledge that the Base Term Commencement Date has occurred as of the date hereof; and </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the parties hereto desire to amend the Participation Agreement as hereinafter set forth and to amend and restate the Pledge Agreement and Custodial Agreement in the form
attached hereto; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW,
THEREFORE, in consideration of the premises and for other good and valuable consideration (the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged), the parties hereto agree as
follows: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;AMENDMENTS.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Effective as of the date hereof and subject to the satisfaction of the conditions
precedent set forth in </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;3</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, the Participation Agreement shall be amended in accordance with </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Sections
1.1</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> through </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>1.20</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.1</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Advances; Limitations and Limits.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The second paragraph of Section&nbsp;3.1(d) of the Participation
Agreement is hereby amended by replacing the second sentence thereof with the following: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"The
final Advance (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Final Advance</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") shall occur on the Base Term Commencement Date to pay Construction Costs consisting solely of
Capitalized Yield, Fees and Transaction Expenses as set forth in an Advance Request delivered by Lessee pursuant to Section&nbsp;3.4(a) on December&nbsp;11, 2001 prior to the Final Advance.
Immediately following the Final Advance, GE and the Participants will cause the GE Assignment to take effect pursuant to the GE Assignment Agreement. Each Advance made on an Advance Date shall be in a
minimum amount equal to $1,000,000 (except for (i)&nbsp;the initial Advance, which shall be in a minimum amount of $500,000 and (ii)&nbsp;the Final Advance, which shall not be subject to a minimum
amount requirement), or an integral multiple of $100,000 in excess thereof, provided, that so long as an Advance is for the full amount of the aggregate Available Commitment and exceeds the minimum
threshold of $1,000,000, such Advance need not be in an integral multiple of $100,000." </FONT></P>

</UL>
</UL>
<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="11",CHK=415807,FOLIO='1',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KS1201A.;7',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:47' -->
<A NAME="page_ks1201_1_2"> </A>
<UL>
<UL>
</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.2</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Basic Rent; Payments of Rent.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;3.2(a) of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended
by (i)&nbsp;deleting the reference to "and" immediately after the reference to "Tranche B Basic Rent," and (ii)&nbsp;adding at the end of sentence thereof the following: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;",
and following the GE Assignment Date, the Tranche A4 Participant shall be entitled to all Tranche A4 Basic Rent." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.3</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Certificates.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;3.7 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by
(i)&nbsp;deleting the last sentence of Section&nbsp;3.7 in its entirety and (ii)&nbsp;adding immediately after the reference to "Promptly upon receipt of such documents by the Administrative
Agent" in the eighth sentence thereof the following: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"and
subject to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;8.21</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> with respect to the issuance on the GE Assignment Date of the initial Certificate to the Tranche A4
Participant" </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.4</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Annual Fee.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;4.1 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding a new
clause&nbsp;(v), which shall read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"(v)&nbsp;On
the Fourth Amendment Effective Date and on each anniversary thereof, Lessee shall pay to the Administrative Agent for its own account an annual fee equal to $20,000." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.5</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Distribution.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;5.3(a) of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by
(i)&nbsp;deleting the reference to "and" immediately after the reference to "Tranche B Participant Balance," and (ii)&nbsp;adding immediately after the reference to "Tranche C Equity Participant
Balance" therein the following: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"and,
following the GE Assignment Date, to each Tranche A4 Participant its pro rata portion of the Tranche A4 Basic Rent based upon its respective portion of the Tranche A4 Participant
Balance," </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.6</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Distribution.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Clause&nbsp;(iv) of Section&nbsp;5.3(b) of the Participation Agreement and the
paragraphs following such clause&nbsp;(iv) are hereby amended and restated in their entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"(iv)&nbsp;Lessee
failing to fulfill one or more of the conditions to the exercise of the Sale Option pursuant to Article&nbsp;XX of the Lease and the Administrative Agent's receipt
of the Lease Balance from Lessee pursuant to Article&nbsp;XX of the Lease, shall be distributed by the Administrative Agent in the following amounts and order of priority: </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>first</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche A Participants and Tranche B Participants for application to pay in full the Participant Balance (other than the
3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion) of each such Participant, and in the case where the amount so distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among the Tranche A Participants and
Tranche B Participants without priority of one such Participant over the other in the proportion that each such Participant's Participant Balance bears to the sum of Tranche A Participant Balance and
Tranche B Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>second</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche A Participants and Tranche B Participants for application to pay in full the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of each such
Participant's Participant Balance, and in the case where the amount so distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among such Participants without priority of one
Participant over the other in the proportion that each Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate sum of the Tranche A Participant Balance and the Tranche B Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>third</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche C Equity Participants for application to pay in full the Tranche C Participant Balance (other than the
3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion) of each Tranche C Equity Participant, and in the case where the amount so distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, </FONT></P>

</UL>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>2</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>

<A NAME="page_ks1201_1_3"> </A>

then pro rata among the Tranche C Equity Participants without priority of one Tranche C Equity Participant over the other in the proportion that each Tranche C Equity Participant's Participant
Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche C Equity Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>fourth</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche C Equity Participants to pay in full the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of each such Tranche C Equity Participant's
Participant Balance; and in the case where the amount so distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among the Tranche C Equity Participants without priority of one
Tranche C Equity Participant over the other in the proportion that each such Tranche C Equity Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche C Participant Balance such Participant;
and </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.7</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Distribution.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;5.3(c) of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in
its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"(c)
The payment by Lessee of the Residual Value Guarantee Amount to the Administrative Agent in accordance with Article&nbsp;XX of the Lease upon Lessee's exercise of the Sale Option
shall be distributed by the Administrative Agent as promptly as possible (it being understood that any such payment received by the Administrative Agent on a timely basis in accordance with the
provisions of the Lease shall be distributed on the date on which such funds are so received) in the following order of priority: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>first</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche A Participants for application to pay in full the Participant Balance of each Tranche A Participant; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>second</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche B Participants for application to pay in full the Participant Balance of each Tranche B Participant, and in the
case where the amounts so distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among the Tranche B Participants without priority of one Tranche B
Participant over the other in the proportion that each such Tranche B Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche B Participant Balance; and </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>third</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche C Equity Participants for application to pay in full the Participant Balance of each Tranche C Equity Participant,
and in the case where the amounts so distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among the Tranche C Equity Participants without priority of one Tranche C Equity
Participant over the other in the proportion that each such Tranche C Equity Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche C Equity Participant Balance." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.8</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Distribution.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;5.3(d) of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in
its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"(d)
Any payments received by the Administrative Agent as net proceeds from the sale of the Premises following the occurrence of an Event of Default under Article&nbsp;XVI of the
Lease, following the occurrence of a Construction Agency Event of Default or pursuant to Lessee's exercise of the Sale Option pursuant to Article&nbsp;XIX of the Lease, together with any payment
made by Lessee as a result of an appraisal pursuant to </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;12.3</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> hereof, shall be distributed by the Administrative Agent as promptly as
possible (it being understood that any such payment received by the Administrative Agent on a timely basis and in accordance with the provisions of the Lease shall be distributed on the date received)
in the funds so received in the following order of priority: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>first</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, on a pro rata basis based on their respective shares of the sum of the Tranche A1&nbsp;Participant Balance (other than the
3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion) and Tranche A2&nbsp;Participant Balance (other than the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion), to the Tranche&nbsp;A1 Participants and Tranche&nbsp;A2 Participants for application to
pay in full the sum of the Tranche&nbsp;A1 Participant Balance and Tranche&nbsp;A2 Participant Balance, and then on a pro rata basis based on their respective shares of the </FONT></P>

</UL>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>3</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=3,SEQ=3,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="11",CHK=982523,FOLIO='3',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KS1201A.;7',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:47' -->
<A NAME="page_ks1201_1_4"> </A>
<UL>
<UL>
<BR>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
Tranche&nbsp;A3 Participant Balance (other than the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion), to the Tranche&nbsp;A3 Participants to pay in full the Tranche&nbsp;A3 Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>second</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche B Participants for application to pay in full the Participant Balance (other than the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion) of
each Tranche B Participant, and in the case where the amount so distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among the Tranche B Participants without priority of one
Tranche B Participant over the other in the proportion that each Tranche B Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche B Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>third</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche C Equity Participants for application to pay in full the Participant Balance (other than the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion)
of each Tranche C Equity Participant, and in the case where the amount so distributed shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among the Tranche C Equity Participants without
priority of one Tranche C Equity Participant over the other in the proportion that
each Tranche C Equity Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche C Equity Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>fourth</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, an amount up to, but not exceeding, the Residual Value Guarantee Amount paid by Lessee, if any, shall be promptly distributed to,
or as directed by, Lessee; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>fifth</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, on a pro rata basis based on their respective shares of the sum of the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of the Tranche A1 Participant Balance
and Tranche A2 Participant Balance, to the Tranche A1 Participants and Tranche A2 Participants for application to pay in full the sum of the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of the Tranche A1 Participant
Balance and Tranche A2 Participant Balance, and then on a pro rata basis based on their respective shares of the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of the Tranche A3 Participant Balance to the Tranche A3
Participants to pay in full the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of the Tranche A3 Participant Balance; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>sixth</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche B Participants to pay in full the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of their Participant Balances until their Participant
Balances have been paid in full; and in any case where the amount shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among such Participants without priority of one Tranche B Participant
over the other in the proportion that each Tranche B Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche B Participant Balance; </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>seventh</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the Tranche C Equity Participants to pay in full the 3.5(ii)&nbsp;portion of their Participant Balances until their
Participant Balances have been paid in full; and in any case where the amount shall be insufficient to pay in full as aforesaid, then pro rata among such Participants without priority of one Tranche C
Equity Participant over the other in the proportion that each Tranche C Equity Participant's Participant Balance bears to the aggregate Tranche C Equity Participant Balance; and </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>eighth</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, the balance, if any, shall be promptly distributed to, or as directed by, Lessee." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.9</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Distribution.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Subclause (ii)&nbsp;of clause </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>third  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>of Section&nbsp;5.3(f) of the Participation Agreement
is hereby amended by deleting immediately after the reference to
"</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.3(c)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" therein the following: "(but excluding clause </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>third </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>from the application
thereof)". </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.10</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Distribution.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Section&nbsp;5.3(g) of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated
in its entirety to read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"(g)
If an Event of Default shall have occurred and be continuing, then any cash held by Agent Lessor and all cash proceeds received by Agent Lessor in respect of any sale of, </FONT></P>

</UL>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>4</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=4,SEQ=4,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="11",CHK=130295,FOLIO='4',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KS1201B.;7',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:47' -->
<A NAME="page_ks1201_1_5"> </A>
<UL>
<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
collection from, or other realization upon, all or any part of the Pledged Collateral shall be distributed by Agent Lessor as promptly as possible in the following order of priority: </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>first</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the payment of any reasonable costs or expenses related to the retaking, holding, preparing for sale and selling the Pledged
Collateral and reasonable attorney's fees and legal expenses incurred by Agent Lessor in respect thereof payable to Agent Lessor pursuant to this Participation Agreement, the Lease and any other
Operative Document; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>second</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, in an amount not to exceed the aggregate Maximum Amount, (a)&nbsp;if received by Agent Lessor prior to the GE Assignment Date,
to the Tranche A1 Participants and Tranche A2 Participants, on a pro rata basis based on their respective shares of the aggregate amount of the Tranche A1 Obligations and Tranche A2 Obligations then
outstanding, to pay in full the Tranche A1 Obligations and Tranche A2 Obligations then due and owing to the Tranche A1 Participants and Tranche A2 Participants, and then, on a pro rata basis based on
their respective shares of the Tranche A3 Obligations, to the Tranche A3 Participants to pay in full the Tranche A3 Obligations then due and owing to the Tranche A3 Participants, or (b)&nbsp;if
received on or following the GE Assignment Date, to the Tranche A4 Participants on a pro rata basis based on their respective shares of the aggregate amount of the Tranche A4 Obligations then
outstanding to pay in full the Tranche A4 Obligations then due and owing to the Tranche A4 Participants; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>third</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, only if received by Agent Lessor prior to the GE Assignment Date, in an amount which, together with all amounts paid under </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>clause second </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>does not exceed the
Maximum Amount to the Tranche B Participants, on a pro rata basis based on their respective shares of the aggregate
amount of the Tranche B Obligations then outstanding, to pay in full the Tranche B Obligations then due and owing to the Tranche B Participants; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>fourth</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, only if received by Agent Lessor prior to the GE Assignment Date, in an amount which, together with all amounts paid under </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>clauses second </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>and </FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>third</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, does not exceed the Maximum Amount, to the Tranche C Equity Participants on a
pro rata basis based on their respective shares of the aggregate amount of the Tranche C Equity Obligations then outstanding, to pay in full the Tranche C Equity Obligations then due and owing to the
Tranche C Equity Participants; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>fifth</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, to the payment of all other reasonable costs and expenses payable to Agent Lessor pursuant to this Participation Agreement, the
Lease and any other Operative Document; and </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>sixth</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, the balance, if any, shall be promptly distributed to, or as directed by, Lessee." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION

the reference to "Tranche ADC Purchase Price" in the first line thereof with the reference to "GE Purchase Price". </FONT></P>

"similar" immediately after the reference to "foreign bank or other". </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)</FONT><FONT

(pursuant to and in accordance with the terms and conditions of the Pledge Agreement and the Custody Agreement) Lessee shall, on or before the Third Amendment Effective Date and on or before the GE
Assignment Date, deliver Treasury Securities to the Custodian to be held by the Custodian in an account (the "</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Enhancer  </I></FONT></P>

</UL>
</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>5</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=5,SEQ=5,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="11",CHK=208935,FOLIO='5',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KS1201B.;7',USER='CTAFT',CD='16-JAN-2002;12:47' -->
<A NAME="page_ks1201_1_6"> </A>
<UL>
<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><I> Collateral Account</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") pursuant to the Custody Agreement, and which Treasury Securities shall have an aggregate Enhancer Collateral Value on the Third Amendment Effective Date
and on the GE Assignment Date (which Enhancer Collateral Value, except in the case of any cash, shall be determined on and as of the Third Amendment Effective Date and on and as of the GE Assignment
Date in accordance with the definition of Market Value (as defined in the Custody Agreement)) equal to or greater than the Enhancer Collateral Requirement applicable to each such date. Except as
provided for in the last sentence of </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;8.21(a)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, the Lessee agrees to maintain in the Enhancer Collateral Account with the Custodian during
the Term, pursuant to the Custody Agreement and subject to the Pledge Agreement, Enhancer Collateral having an aggregate Enhancer Collateral Value at all times equal to or greater than the Enhancer
Collateral Requirement. Without limiting the foregoing and subject to the terms and conditions of the Custody Agreement and the Pledge Agreement, so long as no Default or Event of Default has occurred
and is continuing, (i)&nbsp;Lessee shall have the right from time to time at its sole expense to substitute for all or any of the Enhancer Collateral then subject to a security interest in favor of
Agent Lessor pursuant to the Pledge Agreement and the Custody Agreement, different types of Enhancer Collateral or Enhancer Collateral of the same type which has different dates, maturities, amounts,
interest rates or other characteristics; provided, however, all such substitute Enhancer Collateral shall be of the type described and otherwise comply with the requirements set forth in the
definition of "Enhancer Collateral"; and provided, further, that the Agent Lessor shall maintain a first priority security interest in the substitute Enhancer Collateral as provided for below, and
(ii)&nbsp;to the extent (and only to the extent) that the aggregate Enhancer Collateral Value of the Enhancer Collateral subject to the Pledge Agreement and the Custody Agreement at any time is in
excess of the Enhancer Collateral Requirement, Lessee shall have the right, as set forth in the Custody Agreement, at its sole expense to instruct the Custodian to deliver Enhancer Collateral on
either the Monthly Enhancer Collateral Valuation Date or the Special Enhancer Valuation Date having an aggregate Enhancer Collateral Value up to the amount of such excess to Lessee or its designee,
whereupon the Enhancer Collateral so delivered to Lessee or such designee will no longer be subject to the Pledge Agreement and the Custody Agreement. Agent Lessor shall at all times have a first
priority security interest in the Enhancer Collateral, including all such substituted Enhancer Collateral, for the
benefit of the Secured Parties, free and clear of all other Liens. Neither of the Agents nor any Participant shall bear any liability for any losses on or in respect of any of the Enhancer Collateral,
except as the result of acts of gross negligence or willful misconduct on the part of such party. All income from or in respect of the Enhancer Collateral shall be taxable to Lessee. Except as
expressly provided herein, Lessee shall have no right to withdraw any of the Enhancer Collateral from the Enhancer Collateral Account. Lessee may not direct either Agent or any Participant to apply
any of the Enhancer Collateral to any Obligation, including, without limitation, the obligation of Lessee to pay any amounts due under the Operative Documents, and without limiting Lessee's rights to
distributions pursuant to clauses </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>fourth</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> and </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>eighth</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> of </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.3(d)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, clause </FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>fourth</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> of </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.3(f)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> and clause </FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>sixth</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> of </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;5.3(g)</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>,
Lessee may not offset its obligation to pay any amounts due under the Operative Documents with any proceeds from the Enhancer
Collateral collected by or distributed to the Administrative Agent, Agent Lessor or any Participant. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)</FONT><FONT
SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Enhancer Collateral Valuation.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee shall deliver or cause to be delivered to Administrative Agent
(x)&nbsp;on each of the Third Amendment Effective Date and the GE Assignment Date and (y)&nbsp;by no later than the twenty-first (21st) day of each calendar month (or if such twenty-first (21st)
day is not a Business Day, then the Business Day immediately succeeding such twenty-first (21st) day) following the Third Amendment Effective Date (each such day, an "Enhancer Collateral Valuation
Date") an Enhancer Collateral Valuation Notice </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(n)&nbsp;&nbsp;The

follows: " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Required Participants  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" means, as of the date of the determination, holders of Certificates representing more than two-thirds of the then outstanding Lease Balance. </FONT></P>

Purchase Price". </FONT></P>

Tranche A1 Participant, Tranche A2 Participant, Tranche A3 Participant and following the GE Assignment Date, Tranche A4 Participant. </FONT></P>

definition of "Tranche A2 Basic Rent" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety as follows: " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Tranche A2 Basic Rent  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" means, for each
Payment Date with respect to each Interest Period ending on such Payment Date, an amount equal to the sum of </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(x)&nbsp;&nbsp;with
respect to Certificate Amounts not outstanding at the Alternate Base Rate, the product of (a)&nbsp;the daily aggregate Certificate Amounts of the Tranche A2
Participants, (b)&nbsp;the sum of the LIBO Rate (Reserve Adjusted) for such Interest Period plus the Applicable Tranche A2 Margin, (c)&nbsp;1/360 and (d)&nbsp;the number of days in such Interest
Period; provided, that if a Put Event has occurred, the foregoing clause&nbsp;(b) shall be deemed to be the sum of the LIBO Rate (Reserve Adjusted) for such Interest Period plus the Tranche A2 Put
Margin as in effect from time to time and provided further that immediately
upon the occurrence of an Event of Default, the foregoing clause&nbsp;(b) shall be deemed to be the sum of the Alternate Base Rate in effect in such Interest Period plus 200 basis points per annum;
plus </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(y)&nbsp;&nbsp;with

foregoing clause&nbsp;(b) shall be deemed to be the sum of the Alternate Base Rate plus the Tranche A2 Put Margin as in effect from time to time; and provided further that immediately upon the
occurrence of an Event of Default, the foregoing clause&nbsp;(b) shall be deemed to be the sum of the Alternate Base Rate in effect in such Interest Period plus 200 basis points per annum; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2><I>provided that  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, notwithstanding the foregoing, with respect to the portion of the Tranche A2 Participant Balance attributable to the amounts funded by the Tranche A2 Participant on the date

the LIBO Rate (Reserve Adjusted), during the period commencing on the date of the Final Advance and ending on but excluding date which is the first Payment Date following the Payment Date occurring on
the Base Term Commencement Date. </FONT></P>

</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>provided, however  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Sections&nbsp;2(d)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> and </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>(g)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>need only be satisfactory in the reasonable

connection with the execution and delivery of (i)&nbsp;this Amendment, (ii)&nbsp;the Pledge Agreement, (iii)&nbsp;the Custody Agreement and (iv)&nbsp;each other document, instrument and UCC
financing statement executed and delivered in connection herewith or therewith (the items in clauses (i), (ii)&nbsp;and (iii), collectively, the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Fourth Amendment Documents  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") to the extent each of

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
3.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Each of the parties hereto hereby represents and warrants that, as of the Fourth Amendment Date and the GE Assignment
Date,
(a)&nbsp;the execution, delivery and performance of each Fourth Amendment Document to which it is a party has been duly authorized by such party, (b)&nbsp;the person executing each Fourth
Amendment Document to which it is a party on its behalf has been duly authorized to act on its behalf, (c)&nbsp;each Fourth Amendment Document to which it is a party constitutes its legal, valid,
binding and enforceable agreement, except as enforceability may be limited by bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium or other laws or equitable principles relating to or limiting the
rights of creditors generally, and (d)&nbsp;its entry into each Fourth Amendment Document to which it is a party will not violate any agreement, law, rule or regulation by which it is bound or by
which any of its assets are affected. In order to induce the Participants and the Agent Lessor to execute and deliver each Fourth Amendment Document to which it is a party, Lessee hereby represents to
each of the Participants and the Agent Lessor that, as of the date hereof, (i)&nbsp;the representations and warranties set forth in Section&nbsp;7.2 of the Participation Agreement are and shall be
and remain true and correct, (ii)&nbsp;Lessee is in full compliance with all of the
terms and conditions of each Operative Document and Fourth Amendment Document to which it is a party, (iii)&nbsp;no Default or Event of Default has occurred and is continuing or shall result after
giving effect to each Fourth Amendment Document and (iv)&nbsp;the Agent Lessor (for the benefit of the Secured Parties) has a valid and enforceable first priority Lien on and security interest in
the Pledged Collateral free and clear of all other Liens. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
4.</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>MISCELLANEOUS.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
4.1</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Continuing Effectiveness, etc.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment shall be deemed to be an amendment to the
Participation Agreement, and the Participation Agreement, as amended hereby, and each other Operative Document, shall remain in full force and effect and are hereby ratified, approved and confirmed in
each and every respect. On and after the date hereof, all references to the "Participation Agreement" in the Operative Documents or in any other document, instrument, certificate, agreement, opinion
or writing shall be deemed to refer to the Participation Agreement, as the case may be, as amended hereby. Except as expressly set forth herein, the execution, delivery and effectiveness of this
Amendment shall not operate as an amendment, modification or waiver of any provision of, or any right, power or remedy of any party hereto under, any Operative Document. </FONT></P>

</UL>

<A NAME="page_ku1201_1_16"> </A>
<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
4.2</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Severability.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any provision of this Amendment which is prohibited or unenforceable in any
jurisdiction shall, as to such provision and such jurisdiction, be ineffective to the extent of such prohibition or unenforceability without invalidating the remaining provisions of this Amendment or
affecting the validity or enforceability of such provision in any other jurisdiction. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
4.3</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Headings.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The various headings of this Amendment are inserted for convenience of reference only and
shall not affect the meaning or interpretation of this Amendment or any provisions hereof. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
4.4</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Execution in Counterparts.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment may be executed by the parties hereto in several
counterparts, each of which shall be deemed to be an original and all of which shall constitute together but one and the same agreement. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
4.5</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Governing Law.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS AMENDMENT SHALL IN ALL RESPECTS BE GOVERNED BY THE INTERNAL LAW OF THE STATE OF
NEW YORK AS TO ALL MATTERS OF CONSTRUCTION, VALIDITY AND PERFORMANCE, WITHOUT REGARD TO CONFLICTS OF LAW PRINCIPLES, EXCEPT TITLE 14 OF ARTICLE 5 OF THE NEW YORK GENERAL OBLIGATIONS LAW. This
Amendment constitutes the entire understanding among the parties hereto
with respect to the subject matter hereof and supersedes any prior agreement, written or oral, with respect thereto. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
4.6</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Successors and Assigns.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;This Amendment shall be binding upon and shall inure to the benefit of the
parties hereto and their respective successors and permitted assigns. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
4.7</FONT><FONT SIZE=2><I>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Fees and Expenses.</I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee agrees to pay on demand all costs and expenses of or incurred by each of
the other parties hereto in connection with the negotiation, preparation, execution and delivery of each Fourth Amendment Document, including those costs set forth in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;2(h)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> and the
reasonable fees and expenses of counsel for the Agent Lessor. </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>[signature
pages follow] </FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>16</FONT></P>

<font size=3> -- Click here to rapidly navigate through this document</font>
<!-- TOC_END -->
<P ALIGN="RIGHT"><FONT SIZE=2><B>Exhibit 10-ff  </B></FONT></P>

<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2><A
NAME="kx1201_fifth_amendment_to_participation_agreement"> </A>
<A NAME="toc_kx1201_1"> </A>
<BR></FONT><FONT SIZE=2><B>FIFTH AMENDMENT TO<BR>  PARTICIPATION AGREEMENT    <BR>  </B></FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;THIS FIFTH AMENDMENT TO PARTICIPATION AGREEMENT, dated as of December&nbsp;31, 2001 (this " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Amendment  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), amends the Participation
Agreement, dated as of October&nbsp;22, 1999, by and among ADC Telecommunications,&nbsp;Inc., a Minnesota corporation (" </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>ADC  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>" or " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Lessee  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), as
Lessee; Lease Plan North America,&nbsp;Inc., not in its individual capacity, except as expressly stated therein, but solely as Agent Lessor for the Participants (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Agent Lessor  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"); the Persons
named on Schedule&nbsp;I thereto, as Participants; and ABN AMRO Bank N.V., as Administrative Agent, as amended by (A)&nbsp;the First Amendment to
Participation Agreement, dated as of January&nbsp;29, 2001 (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>First Amendment  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), (B)&nbsp;the Second Amendment to Participation Agreement, dated as of August&nbsp;24, 2001 (the " </FONT> <FONT
SIZE=2><I>Second Amendment  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), (C)&nbsp;the Third Amendment to the Participation Agreement and Lease, dated as of October&nbsp;31, 2001 (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Third Amendment  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") and
(D)&nbsp;the Fourth Amendment to the Participation Agreement and Lease, dated as of December&nbsp;11, 2001 (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Fourth Amendment  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") (as so amended by the First Amendment, the Second Amendment, the
Third Amendment and the Fourth Amendment, the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Participation Agreement  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"). Capitalized terms used herein and not otherwise defined herein shall have the respective meanings assigned thereto in
Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement.
 </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the parties hereto have entered into the Participation Agreement and the other Operative Documents to fund the Construction of the Financed Improvements on the Land; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
prior to the date of this Amendment, the Put Event and Base Term Commencement Date have occurred; </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;WHEREAS,
the parties hereto desire to amend the Participation Agreement as hereinafter set forth, including to amend certain existing covenants and create new affirmative covenants of
Lessee and to set forth the applicable margins with respect to the calculation of Basic Rent; </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;NOW,
THEREFORE, in consideration of the premises and for other good and valuable consideration (the receipt and sufficiency of which are hereby acknowledged), the parties hereto agree as
follows: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1. AMENDMENTS. Effective as of the date hereof and subject to the satisfaction of the conditions precedent set forth in </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;2  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, the Participation Agreement shall be amended in accordance with
</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Sections&nbsp;1.1  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2> through </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>1.16  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></P>


<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.1 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Fees  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;4.1(b)(ii)&nbsp;of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by deleting the second paragraph in its entirety. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.2 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Fees  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;4.1 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding a new clause&nbsp;(vi), which shall read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>"(vi)
On the Fifth Amendment Effective Date and on the first day of each Fiscal Quarter thereafter, if the then aggregate Benefited Participants' outstanding Participant Balances is not fully Cash
Collateralized on any such date pursuant to </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Section&nbsp;8.20(c)  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, Lessee shall pay on each such date to each Benefited Participant a fee (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Ticking Fee  </I></FONT><FONT
SIZE=2>") equal to the product of (A)&nbsp;the then outstanding Uncollateralized Participant Balance for such Participant and (B)&nbsp;10 basis points (0.10%)." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.3 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Fees  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;4.1 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding a new clause&nbsp;(vii), which shall read as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>"(vii)&nbsp;Lessee
shall pay to each Benefited Participant from time to time a facility fee (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Facility Fee  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") at a rate per annum equal to the product of (x)&nbsp;20 basis points (0.20%) per annum and (y)&nbsp;such
Benefited Participant's outstanding Participant Balance as of
the date such fee is calculated; such Facility Fees being payable to Lessee on each Payment Date. </FONT></P>

</UL>
<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=1,SEQ=1,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="12",CHK=62679,FOLIO='1',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KX1201A.;9',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_kx1201_1_2"> </A>
<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
Administrative Agent shall provide to Lessee from time to time not less than six (6)&nbsp;Business Days prior to the due date(s) for the Commitment Fees, a written statement of the
amount of the Commitment Fees then due, the due date therefor and the calculation thereof; </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>provided, however  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that the Administrative Agent's failure to give such notice shall not relieve Lessee of
its obligation to pay timely all Commitment Fees, Ticking Fees and Facility Fees. The
Commitment Fees and Facility Fees shall be payable in arrears on each Payment Date and shall be computed on the basis of the actual number of days from and including each Payment Date to but excluding
the next succeeding Payment Date (or for any partial period, for the actual number of days in such partial period, including the first day of such partial period but excluding the last day of such
partial period), for which such Commitment Fees and Facility Fees are payable over a year of 360&nbsp;days; </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>provided, however  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that the initial period for the Commitment Fees shall be the period from
and including the Document Closing Date to but excluding the immediately succeeding Payment Date; </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>provided, however  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>, that the initial period for the Facility Fees shall be the period from and
including the Fifth Amendment Effective Date to but excluding the immediately succeeding Payment
Date." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.4 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Limitation on Liens  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;8.2(j) of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding immediately after the reference to "permitted hereunder" the following: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>"and
for purposes of acquiring additional assets in which neither Lessee nor its Subsidiaries has an interest prior to the date such capital leases become effective" </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.5 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Limitation on Liens  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;8.2(k) of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>"(k)
(A)&nbsp;Liens on any Excluded Asset (other than Excluded Assets of the type described at sections 4, 5 and 6 of Schedule&nbsp;I to the Fifth Amendment) and (B)&nbsp;a Lien granted to First
Union National Bank on the Asset Collateral for purposes of securing First Union National Bank's consent under Section&nbsp;8.22 of the Participation Agreement, provided that First Union National
Bank's rights in such assets will be pari passu with those rights of the Agent Lessor and will only secure the obligations (not to exceed $53,000,000 in the aggregate) under the existing Synthetic
Lease evidenced in part by that certain Participation Agreement dated as of December&nbsp;12, 2000, as amended among ADC Telecommunications,&nbsp;Inc., First Security Bank, National Association
(now known as Wells Fargo Bank Northwest, N.A.), First Union Securities,&nbsp;Inc. and First Union National Bank." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.6 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Limitation on Liens  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;8.2 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by deleting clause&nbsp;(l) in its entirety. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.7 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Limitation on Liens  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;8.2 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding the following paragraph immediately after clause&nbsp;(k) thereof: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>"If
Lessee shall have fully Cash Collateralized the Obligations in accordance with Section&nbsp;8.20(c) and all applicable preference periods shall, in the reasonable judgment of Administrative
Agent, have lapsed, then upon satisfaction of the foregoing requirements and following the receipt by the Administrative Agent of a written request from Lessee, Agent Lessor, Administrative Agent and
the Required Participants shall reasonably cooperate to amend the Operative Documents to delete the covenants with respect to restrictions on Liens at this Section&nbsp;8.2." </FONT></P>

</UL>

", with respect to the following clauses (a), (b)&nbsp;and (c)&nbsp;below, and any Wholly-Owned </FONT></P>

Subsidiary may, with respect to clause&nbsp;(d) below," and (B)&nbsp;amending and restating clause&nbsp;(c) in its entirety as follows: </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.10 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Net Worth  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;8.17 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety as follows: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>"Lessee
shall not permit at any time Net Worth to be less than the sum of (a)&nbsp;$1,638,000,000, plus (b)&nbsp;for each fiscal year, commencing with the fiscal year ending October&nbsp;31,
2001, 50% of positive net income for such fiscal year, plus (c)&nbsp;with respect to the issuance or sale of capital stock of Lessee or the conversion of Indebtedness of Lessee into equity of
Lessee, in each case occurring after the date hereof, 50% of the aggregate Net Issuance Proceeds received by Lessee from such issuance or sale of capital stock, plus 50% of the principal amount of any
Indebtedness so converted if such issuance, sale or conversion occurs at a time when Lessee shall have no Rating or at a time when Lessee's Rating is
lower than BBB- and Baa3, respectively; such covenant to be calculated as of the end of each Fiscal Quarter." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.13 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Enhancer Collateral  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Section&nbsp;8.20 of the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding immediately after clause&nbsp;(b) thereof the following new clause&nbsp;(c): </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>"(c)
</FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Additional Enhancer Collateral  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Following the receipt of a written request by Lessee and provided no Event of Default exists, Agent Lessor and Administrative Agent shall reasonably cooperate with
Lessee to
permit Lessee to Cash Collateralize the Obligations which are or may from time to time be due and owing to the Benefited Participants in accordance with the terms and conditions to be agreed upon
between the parties hereto and satisfactory to Agent Lessor, </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>4</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=4,SEQ=4,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="12",CHK=702925,FOLIO='4',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KX1201A.;9',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_kx1201_1_5"> </A>
<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
Administrative Agent and each Participant in their sole and reasonable discretion. In connection with such request and prior to delivery of any Additional Enhancer Collateral, Lessee shall execute
and deliver to Agent Lessor for the benefit of the Benefited Participants, such amendments to the Operative Documents (including, without limitation, Section&nbsp;5.3 of the Participation Agreement)
and such further documents and instruments as Agent Lessor or Administrative Agent may reasonably request to evidence the creation and perfection of the security interest and Lien in the Additional
Enhancer Collateral, including the execution, delivery, filing and recording of any pledge or security agreements, custody agreements, financing statements and acknowledgments and opinions of counsel
requested by Agent Lessor or Administrative Agent. Agent Lessor for the benefit of the Benefited Participants shall have a first priority perfected security interest in the Additional Enhancer
Collateral." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.14 The Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding immediately after Section&nbsp;8.21 thereof the following new Section&nbsp;8.22: </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"SECTION
8.22 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Asset Collateral  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lessee
shall, on the earlier of (i)&nbsp;March&nbsp;31, 2002 (the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Asset Collateralization Date  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>") or (ii)&nbsp;the date on which a lien is granted to First Union National Bank for purposes of securing its
consent under Section&nbsp;8.22 of the Participation
Agreement, pledge and grant to Agent Lessor for the benefit of the Benefited Participants, a security interest in and Lien upon all of the consolidated assets (tangible and intangible) of Lessee and
its Affiliates and Subsidiaries, other than Excluded Assets, whether then or thereafter existing or in which Lessee then has or thereafter acquires an interest and wherever the same may be located
(the " </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Asset Collateral  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>"), to secure the Obligations which are or may from time to time be due and owing to the Benefited Participants. Upon request by Lessee and Lessee's demonstration to the
reasonable satisfaction of the Required Participants that the capital stock or other equity ownership interests of an entity having its jurisdiction of organization outside of the United States
represent an immaterial portion of the Net Worth of Lessee and that such perfection of security interest in such assets would be uneconomical, the Required Participants will reasonably consider not
requiring Lessee to make filings or recordings outside the United States to perfect security interests in such assets. Prior to the Asset Collateralization Date, Lessee shall execute and deliver to
Agent Lessor for the benefit of the Benefited Participants, such amendments to the Operative Documents (including, without limitation, Section&nbsp;5.3 of the Participation Agreement) and such
further documents, opinions of counsel and instruments as Agent Lessor or Administrative Agent may reasonably request to evidence the creation and perfection of the security interest and Liens in the
Asset Collateral, including the execution, delivery, filing and recording of any mortgages, intercreditor agreements, financing statements and acknowledgments requested by Agent Lessor or
Administrative Agent. Agent Lessor for the benefit of the Benefited Participants shall have a first priority security interest and Lien in the Asset Collateral, subject only to Liens permitted by
Section&nbsp;8.2, provided that the security interest or Lien granted to Agent Lessor pursuant to this Section&nbsp;8.22 shall be at least equal in priority to such other permitted liens, other
than such permitted liens at Section&nbsp;8.2 which by operation of law would be senior to the Liens to be granted to Agent Lessor hereunder. Agent Lessor or Administrative Agent shall deliver a
draft of the security agreement providing for a grant of the Lien on the Asset Collateral to Lessee by not later than March&nbsp;1, 2002." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.15 The Participation Agreement is hereby amended by adding immediately after Section&nbsp;8.22 thereof the following new Section&nbsp;8.23: </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;"8.23 </FONT> <FONT SIZE=2><I>Credit Facilities  </I></FONT><FONT SIZE=2>. Lessee hereby covenants that it shall promptly inform in writing Agent Lessor and Administrative Agent of any
credit facility to which it is a party and which shall become
effective on or after December&nbsp;31, 2001 and shall promptly provide Agent Lessor and Administrative Agent with written copies of all documentation relating to the same, including </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>5</FONT></P>

<HR NOSHADE>
<!-- ZEQ.=5,SEQ=5,EFW="2067550",CP="ADC TELECOMMUNICATIONS, INC.",DN="12",CHK=880334,FOLIO='5',FILE='DISK009:[02STP1.02STP1201]KX1201B.;4',USER='PBELANG',CD='16-JAN-2002;01:45' -->
<A NAME="page_kx1201_1_6"> </A>
<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>
without limitation an accurate and complete copy of any credit agreement made a part thereof. Lessee further acknowledges and agrees that the Agent Lessor, Administrative Agent and the
Noncollateralized Required Participants may, at their sole discretion, elect to revise and amend the Operative Documents as necessary to conform the Operative Documents to the provisions of any such
credit facility. Lessee further acknowledges and agrees that it shall reasonably cooperate with the Agent Lessor, Administrative Agent and the Noncollateralized Required Participants to effectuate any
such amendments or revisions to such documents." </FONT></P>

</UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;SECTION
1.16 Definitions. </FONT></P>

<UL>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "ADC Event of Default" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by (A)&nbsp;deleting the "or" at the end of
clause&nbsp;(j) thereof, (B)&nbsp;replacing the period at the end of clause&nbsp;(k) thereof with ";" and (C)&nbsp;adding to such definition immediately after clause&nbsp;(k) thereof the
following new clauses (l)&nbsp;and (m)&nbsp;as follows: "(l) Lessee fails to comply with the obligations set forth in Section&nbsp;8.22 of the Participation Agreement on or before the Asset
Collateralization Date; or (m)&nbsp;Lessee fails to promptly execute any documentation submitted by Agent Lessor, Administrative Agent or the Noncollateralized Required Participants pursuant to or
in pursuance of Section&nbsp;8.23 of the Participation Agreement." </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "Applicable Tranche A2 Margin" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by deleting the reference to "225 basis
points" and replacing it with the reference to "375 basis points". </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "Applicable Tranche A3 Margin" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by deleting the reference to "235 basis
points" and replacing it with the reference to "385 basis points". </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "Applicable Tranche B Margin" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by deleting the reference to "250 basis
points" and replacing it with the reference to "400 basis points". </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "Applicable Tranche C Margin" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended by deleting the reference to "350 basis
points" and replacing it with the reference to "500 basis points". </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "Debt" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety as follows: "Debt" of a Person
means "Indebtedness" of such Person of the types described in clauses (a), (b), (c), (d), (e), (f)&nbsp;and (g)&nbsp;of the definition thereof and clause&nbsp;(i) of the definition thereof as to
the Guaranty Obligations in respect of indebtedness or obligations of customers of Lessee or its Subsidiaries or Affiliates, together with all Indebtedness of the type described in such clauses
secured by (or for which the holder of such Indebtedness has an existing right, contingent or otherwise, to be secured by) any Lien upon or in property (including accounts receivable and contracts
rights) owned by such Person, even though such Person has not assumed or become liable for the payment of such Indebtedness. </FONT></P>

<P><FONT SIZE=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;(g)&nbsp;&nbsp;The
definition of "EBITDA" appearing in Appendix&nbsp;1 to the Participation Agreement is hereby amended and restated in its entirety as follows: "EBITDA" means, for
any applicable period, Net Income for such period, plus (A)&nbsp;to the extent deducted in determining Net Income for such period, the aggregate amount of (i)&nbsp;Interest Expense,
(ii)&nbsp;federal, state, local and foreign income taxes, (iii)&nbsp;depletion, depreciation and amortization of tangible and intangible assets and (iv)&nbsp;the interest component of rent
expense for such period associated with all Synthetic Leases under which the Lessee or any Subsidiary is the lessee minus (B).without duplication and to the extent included in determining such Net
Income, any extraordinary gains for such period, all determined on a consolidated basis in accordance with GAAP. </FONT></P>

</UL>
<P ALIGN="CENTER"><FONT SIZE=2>6</FONT></P>
